name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 4023 ‘Talent' EMU Add-On
description: First designed in the 1990s, the Talent truly is the forefront of modern European transportation for both passengers and drivers alike. With such sparks as the ever-successful Talent 2 in its legacy, the Austrian Federal Railway can be proud of operating such a uniquely versatile EMU.

name: Train Simulator: Los Angeles Commuter Rail F59PH Loco Add-On
description: Based on the GP59, the first in the F59 Series - the F59PH - is a common diesel electric locomotive used by a number of North American railroads. The F59PH, built by General Motors Electro-Motive Division, offered a more fuel efficiency and more efficient driving conditions than its predecessors.

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 1142 Loco Add-On
description: In recent years, some locomotives have been retired, or been sold to other operators in Europe, however ÖBB still retain a fleet of 45 for their own use. All told, for a design pushing through its mid-50s, the ÖBB 1142 represents an outstanding feat of engineering.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 112.1 Loco Add-On
description: Take control of the iconic DB BR 112.1 in this Pro Range addition for Train Simulator.In the wake of the 1973 Oil Crisis, Deutsche Reichsbahn were looking to reinstate their electrification of East Germany.

name: Train Simulator: GEML BR Class 315 EMU Add-On
description: The Class 315 fleet has spent 38 years working both the GEML, the Lea Valley Lines, and occasionally stretching further afield to the likes of Braintree - however their most notable work is the stopping 'metro' services between London and Shenfield, a distance of around 20 miles.

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific SD45 Loco Add-On
description: The EMD SD45 was one of the first standard North American diesel locomotives to use a 20 cylinder diesel engine.

name: Train Simulator: PRR GG1 Loco Add-On
description: The GG1 electric locomotive is a true icon of North American railroading.

name: Train Simulator: NJ TRANSIT Arrow III EMU Add-On
description: NJ Transit's classic Arrow III electric-multiple-unit railcars began rolling out of General Electric's erecting halls four decades ago and have since become an iconic fixture of New Jersey's commuter railroading scene, serving on many NJ Transit routes including the North Jersey Coast Line, Morristown Line, and Northeast Corridor.

name: Train Simulator: New Haven DL-109 Loco Add-On
description: Take the throttle of a pioneering, and stylish, American diesel locomotive - with the New Haven Alco DL109 for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator 2021: Frankfurt High Speed - Frankfurt: Karlsruhe Route Extension
description: Stretching across the Rhine Valley and the Hessian Ried, Frankfurt High Speed: Frankfurt - Karlsruhe is a definitive and landmark arrival in Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: New Haven E-33 Loco Add-On
description: Built by General Electric in the 1950s to haul coal for the Virginian Railway, a group of 3,300-horsepower ignitron rectifier electrics were purchased second-hand in 1963 by the New Haven Railroad to haul tonnage between New York City and New Haven, Connecticut.

name: Train Simulator: LNER Class V2 Steam Loco Add-On
description: Experience a true workhorse of the LNER, the authentic and advanced LNER V2 locomotive from Just Trains!

name: Train Simulator: BR 266 Loco Add-On
description: The modern and low-emission BR 266 comes to Train Simulator, ideal for running freight services on Germany's extensive rail network. Built in Canada by General Motors, the BR 266 is based on the UK's Class 66 diesel locomotive, externally resembling the UK locomotive in appearance but with a different internal control desk to accommodate...

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 146.5 & BR 668.2 ‘Intercity 2’ Loco Add-On
description: Experience modern passenger traction in the form of DB's stylish "IC2", which is ready for service in Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: BR GT3 Turbine Loco Add-On
description: One of the more unusual locomotives ever to be built, the GT3 Gas Turbine Prototype is nevertheless part of British railway history and is now available for Train Simulator from Victory Works.The GT3 was part of a programme for the development of gas turbine locomotives started in the late 1940s.

name: Train Simulator: Chessie System Retro Pack
description: Take the throttle of the Chessie System's magnificent and diverse motive power and enjoy classic railroading amid the historic farmlands and scenic mountains of Maryland and Pennsylvania - with the Chessie System Retro Pack!

name: Train Simulator: Class 57 Rail Tour Loco Add-On
description: The re-engineered, multi-purpose Class 57 locomotive in special Rail Tours livery, with scenarios created for the Settle-Carlisle route, is now available for Train Simulator. Rebuilt from the Class 47, the Class 57s entered service in 1997 and are affectionately known as 'Bodysnatchers' or 'Zombies', by virtue of their modification from...

name: Train Simulator: Western Pacific GP35 Add-On
description: The Electro-Motive 2,500-horsepower GP35 was a railroading success story, with more than 1,300 of the locomotives sold to 40 original railroad buyers during its 1963-1966 production run.

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 58 Loco Add-On
description: The distinctive Class 58, nicknamed the 'Bone' because of its unusual shape with a wide cab at either end, is now available to lend some serious hauling power in Train Simulator. The Class 58 was built between 1983 and 1987 by BREL in Doncaster Works as British Rail wanted a new freight locomotive that would be lower in cost and...

name: Train Simulator: Thompson Class B1 Loco Add-On
description: The London and North Eastern Railway's mixed traffic Thompson B1 Class locomotive for Train Simulator includes scenarios specially created for the popular Woodhead Line.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 605 ICE TD Add-On
description: One of Germany's most modern diesel multiple units speeds into Train Simulator, with the ICE TD joining the popular ICE fleet.

name: Train Simulator: Class 67 Diamond Jubilee Loco Add-On
description: Drive the Queen aboard the Royal Train to her Jubilee Celebrations, pulled by the Class 67 Diesel Electric locomotive.

name: Train Simulator: Battle For Sherman Hill Add-On
description: The Battle for Sherman Hill delivers the ultimate railroading experience, Union Pacific's crossing of America's Continental Divide. With "The Battle for Sherman Hill," you will tackle the challenges of moving heavy freight throughout the decades, from the steam era to the railroading of today!

name: Train Simulator: Rebuilt Bulleid Light Pacific Steam Loco Add-On
description: Oliver Bulleids' finest work, the Rebuilt Light Pacifics of the Southern Railway, in this superb Pro-Range rendition of the class courtesy of Partner Programme developer, Just Trains.

name: Train Simulator: BR Standard Class 7 'Britannia Class' Steam Loco Add-On
description: Experience the beauty of the Britannia with Just Trains' BR Standard Class 7 locomotive!

name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern SD60E Loco Add-On
description: Norfolk Southern’s distinctive SD60E rebuilt locomotive, featuring the railroad's unique "Crescent Cab," is now available for Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 152 Loco Add-On
description: The mixed-traffic BR 152 is one of the most popular locomotives among drivers seen on Germany's railways today. The high performance ES64F locomotive built by Siemens forms part of the company's EuroSprinter range, and started life as a mixed traffic locomotive.

name: Train Simulator: DR BR 24 Loco Add-On
description: A workhorse of German and Polish railways, the BR 24 'Steppenpferd' comes to Train Simulator from Romantic Railroads. The 'Steppenpferd' ('Prairie Horse') was developed specifically for the long, flat routes in West and East Prussia between 1928 and 1940 as passenger locomotives.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Canadian Mountain Passes - Revelstoke-Lake Louise
description: Canada's first transcontinental railway through the dramatic Rocky Mountains comes to life in this beautiful new route for Train Simulator, featuring imposing mountain passes, steep gradients and famous spiral tunnels.

name: Train Simulator: Bulleid Q1 Class Loco Add-On
description: The 'ugly duckling' of Southern steam is now here for Train Simulator, brought to you by Victory Works. World War II halted production of steam locomotives in the UK, but a large increase in goods traffic across the country forced a shortage of suitable motive power for the Southern Railway.

name: Train Simulator: DB ICE 2 EMU Add-On
description: The second-generation Deutsche Bahn ICE 2 is synonymous with stylish high speed train travel in Germany, and now you can take control of this cool express train in Train Simulator.The ICE 2 is the second class of high speed train serving the German railway network, built between 1995 and 1997 as an enhanced high speed unit to its...

name: Train Simulator: DB BR143 Loco Add-On
description: The BR143 Add-On offers one of the most accurate and involving locomotive driving experiences currently available for Train Simulator 2012.

name: Train Simulator: Canadian National SD70 Loco Add-On
description: Climb into a classic EMD Spartan Cab and do some heavy hauling - with the Canadian National Electro-Motive 4,000-horsepower SD70 for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 423 '4VEP' EMU Add-On
description: The 4VEP Add-On takes you back to the days of the classic 'slam-door' commuter trains on the Woking-Portsmouth Line.

name: Train Simulator: GWR Pannier Tank Pack Add-On
description: Delve into the Great Western once more with the famed and versatile GWR Pannier Tanks!

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 1822 Loco Add-On
description: Built in the early 1990s, the ÖBB 1822 was designed as a mixed-traffic locomotive specifically for conquering the challenging Brenner Pass, as well as being able to be used on both Austria’s and Italy's differing electrification systems. Experience the stylish ÖBB 1822 from RSSLO in Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: Clinchfield Railroad U36C Loco Add-On
description: Hauling ponderous coal trains through America's rugged Appalachian Mountains called for horsepower, lots of it, and in 1971 the famed Clinchfield Railroad purchased General Electric's U36C diesel, then one of the most power locomotives in the world.

name: Train Simulator: London Underground S8 EMU Add-On
description: Experience state-of-the-art commuter traction in the form of Just Trains' stylish London Underground S8 Stock!

name: Train Simulator: InterCity BR Class 89 'Badger' Loco Add-On
description: The BR Class 89 was a prototype electric locomotive that was set to transform the East Coast Main Line, and while reality went in a different direction, one cannot deny the unique and powerful design that was the "Badger", and this one-of-a-kind loco is available to drive in Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: RhB Enhancement Pack 05 Add-On
description: Experience a touch of history with Rivet Games' RhB Enhancement Pack 05, which features a unique example of a Ge 6/6 II locomotive in classic RhB Green livery!

name: Train Simulator: London Underground S7+1 EMU Add-On
description: Experience state-of-the-art commuter traction in the form of Just Trains' stylish London Underground S7+1 Stock!

name: Train Simulator: Metro North M2 EMU Add-On
description: For nearly half-a-century, Metro-North's famed M2 electric-multiple-unit (EMU) trains carried commuters to and from New York City, earning the electrics, along with their younger M4 sisters, legendary status around the Big Apple - and now these American railroad classics come to Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator 2021: Bernina Pass - St Moritz: Poschiavo Route
description: Climb the mountains and explore stunning Switzerland - Thomson Interactive's popular line-up of Swiss add-ons continues with the famed Bernina Pass.

name: Train Simulator: Green & Gold HST DMU Add-On
description: In 1999, after acquisition by FirstGroup, Great Western Trains applied a revised livery to their existing stock without the need for repainting!

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 1144 & CityShuttle Wiesel Loco Add-On
description: Climb aboard iconic Austrian traction in the form of the advanced ÖBB 1144 and CityShuttle "Wiesel" from Skyhook Games and Railworks Austria!

name: Train Simulator: Network Southeast Class 47 Loco Add-On
description: Network SouthEast (NSE) was one of three passenger sectors Created by British Rail in 1982.

name: Train Simulator: Konstanz - Villingen Route Extension: Villingen - Hausach
description: Expand upon the stunning Konstanz - Villingen route with the even more impressive Black Forest extension to Hausach!

name: Train Simulator: BNSF ES44AC & SD40-2 Loco Add-On
description: For more than 150 years, the BNSF Railway has provided the backbone of US freight transportation

name: Train Simulator: CPRR 4-6-0 Buffalo Steam Loco Add-On
description: Smokebox, which has brought "Old West" railroading to full life in Train Simulator, now adds to the experience – with Central Pacific’s 1860s-era 4-6-0 "Buffalo!"

name: Train Simulator: Southeastern Class 465 EMU Add-On
description: The Class 465 EMU is a popular sight across the south east of England on commuter services, and this modern four-car unit is now available for Train Simulator. The Class 465 'Networker' replaced the ageing Class 415 (4EPB) EMUs that were previously in service across the southern rail network.

name: Train Simulator: Southern Pacific Cab Forward Loco Add-On
description: The Southern Pacific Cab Forward is a classic oil-burner from the glory days of US Steam.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR111 Loco Add-On
description: The commuter BR111 electric locomotive seen across Germany since the 1970s is now available for Train Simulator, with accompanying DBbzf Control Car and double decker passenger coaches.

name: Train Simulator: GEML Class 90 Loco Add-On
description: A mainstay of BR's locomotive fleet in the 1990s, the Class 90 was a replacement to BR's ageing fleet of electric locomotives, and is now available for Train Simulator in two liveries that are ideal for the Great Eastern Main Line London-Ipswich route.

name: Train Simulator: Miami Commuter Rail F40PHL-2 Loco Add-On
description: The F40PHL-2 diesel locomotive is perfect for commuter services in sunny South Florida, and is now here for Train Simulator, complete with bi-level commuter coaches and driveable cab car.The F40PHL-2 is among the most unique and fascinating locomotives found in the U. S.

name: Train Simulator: LNER Peppercorn Class K1 Loco Add-On
description: The LNER Peppercorn K1 locomotives were built between 1949 and 1950, with the intention of splitting them between the North Eastern and Eastern Regions. Many K1s would regularly be seen as far north as Edinburgh and they were frequently used on the West Highland line in the early days.

name: Train Simulator: Clear Creek Log & Lumber Expansion Pack Add-On
description: Across America in the 19th and early 20th centuries, small railroads busied themselves hauling logs and lumber. And now, the Clear Creek Log and Lumber Expansion Pack brings the captivating experience of steam-era logging and lumber railroading to Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 425 EMU Add-On
description: Authentic regional running comes to life with Maik Goltz's incredibly detailed DB BR 425, which is ready for service in Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 150/1 DMU Add-On
description: This highly-detailed recreation with typical controls and cab features, puts you in the driving seat of one of Britain's iconic diesel multiple units. By the 1980s, British Rail were still operating a vast fleet of old Heritage DMUs, which dated back to the mid-1950s, across much of Britain’s rural and...

name: Train Simulator: UP GE 44 Loco Add-On
description: A Union Pacific Railroad switcher for the Cajon Pass.

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific GP40X Loco Add-On
description: Experience the experimental - with the Union Pacific Electro-Motive 3,500-horsepower GP40X for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: LNER Raven Q6 Steam Loco Add-On
description: Brace yourself for a real challenge as Victory Works bring Sir Vincent Raven’s powerful fleet of LNER Q6s to life on the Weardale & Teesdale Network - the first public route to use steam locomotives!

name: Train Simulator: InterCity Class 91 Loco Add-On
description: The flagship locomotive for the East Coast Main Line, the Class 91, speeds into Train Simulator in its original InterCity Swallow livery, complete with Mk4 coaches and Driving Van Trailer.The Class 91 was built as a development of the Advanced Passenger Train (APT) project, which was abandoned during the 1980s, and was introduced in 1988...

name: Train Simulator: Tehachapi Pass: Mojave - Bakersfield Route Add-On
description: Tehachapi! The name and the place stand among the pantheon of American railroading. And now, the legendary and rugged rail line shared by Union Pacific and BNSF comes to Train Simulator with Dovetail Games' Tehachapi Pass route!

name: Train Simulator: Virgin Trains First Generation Pack Loco Add-On
description: The Virgin Trains First Generation Pack brings classic cross-border action and 'dash of red' operations aboard famed traction.

name: Train Simulator: LGV Rhône-Alpes & Méditerranée Route Extension Add-On
description: LGV Rhône-Alpes & Méditerranée covers the line from Gare de Marseille-Saint-Charles to Lyon Gare de Lyon-Part-Dieu and Gare de Saint-Exupéry TGV, extending the original route threefold to bring a total of 309 km of breath-taking scenery and enthralling high-speed to Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: TGV Réseau & TGV-RDuplex EMU Add-On
description: Complete with high fidelity visuals and 3 distinct variants, the TGV-Réseau & TGV-RDuplex make for a fantastic high-speed addition to your Train Simulator collection!

name: Train Simulator: SBB RABe 523 EMU Add-On
description: Climb the steep gradients and enjoy the incredible views taking this train along the Gotthardbahn, making sure to get your passengers to their destination safely. Get on board and master the SBB RABe 523!

name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern GP33 ECO Loco Add-On
description: In 2015 Norfolk Southern begin converting aged EMD GP50 diesels into like-new, highly efficient and environmental friendly GP33ECO diesels, which now come to Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: NJ TRANSIT U34CH Loco Add-On
description: The distinctive, burly, and powerful General Electric U34CH diesel that toted commuters in New Jersey and New York for more than two decades is now available for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: LNER BR Class 43 'High Speed Train' Remastered Loco Add-On
description: Rediscover the "Journey Shrinker", as the instantly recognisable High Speed Train has been given a substantial upgrade in Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: Fowler 4F Loco Add-On
description: Designed by Henry Fowler the 4F is a class of 0-6-0 locomotive created primarily for medium freight work

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 407 'New ICE 3' EMU Add-On
description: Step aboard and get up to speed in Velaro family's latest and greatest iteration, the authentically crafted DB BR 407 'New ICE 3' delivers a "next level" high-speed experience to Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern GP50HH Loco Add-On
description: The 3,500-horsepower Electro-Motive GP50 in unique "high-hood" configuration is now available for Train Simulator duty wearing Norfolk Southern’s distinctive livery.

name: Train Simulator: Class 86 Loco Add-On
description: The Class 86 add-on brings classic British electric traction to Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: D&RGW SD50 Loco Add-On
description: Electro-Motive Division's powerful SD50 comes to Train Simulator from Digital Train Model. The SD50 from General Motors Electro-Motive Division was produced to counter increasingly tough competition from GE Transportation Systems' Dash 7 line, which was proving to be successful with US railroads.

name: Train Simulator: First Capital Connect Class 319 EMU Add-On
description: The modern, dual-voltage Class 319 EMU is here for Train Simulator in the familiar First Capital Connect livery as seen on Thameslink services out of London.Typical of EMUs built in the 1980s, the Class 319 was built by BREL York between 1987 and 1990 for north-south cross-London services from Bedford to Brighton, entering...

name: Train Simulator: RhB Enhancement Pack 01
description: Take control of the unique UNESCO Branded Ge 4/4 III in this enhancement pack add-on for Train Simulator.The opening of the Vereina Tunnel, what would become the longest tunnel on the RhB, was projected to cause a major spike in both passenger and freight traffic across the mountainous network.

name: Train Simulator: Gatwick Express Class 442 'Wessex' EMU Add-On
description: The Class 442 'Wessex Electric' (or 5WES) electric multiple unit (EMU) was introduced in 1988 on the South Western main line between London Waterloo and Weymouth. Their introduction coincided with the completion of the electrification from Bournemouth to Weymouth.

name: Train Simulator: BNSF Locomotive Pack Add-On
description: Three classic Electro-Motive second-generation diesels - the best-selling SD40-2, versatile GP38-2, and iconic F45 - in Burlington Northern and BNSF liveries are ready for Train Simulator service in this remarkable pack.

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 27 Loco Add-On
description: The mid-sized Class 27 diesel locomotive is now here for Train Simulator in British Rail Green livery.Built for British Rail between 1961 and 1962 by the Birmingham Railway Carriage and Wagon Company, the 69 models in the Class initially saw use around London and in Scotland.

name: Train Simulator: GWR Saint Class & Travelling Post Office Loco Add-On
description: Delivering mail and hauling passengers was the Saint Class' staple throughout their operational lives, leaving London as the day comes to a close and passing through the Riviera Line in the shadow of night.

name: Train Simulator: Network Southeast Class 205 'Thumper' DEMU Add-On
description: Travel back to the waning years of the 20th Century with the iconic, superbly-detailed, Class 205 'Thumper'. Represented in absolute stunning detail, with authentic and characteristic sounds, expertly crafted, capturing the unmistakable character of these units.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR420 EMU Add-On
description: The three-car BR 420 electric multiple unit (EMU) has plied its trade across many of Germany's city S-Bahn networks, and is now available for Train Simulator with scenarios for the Munich-Augsburg route.

name: Train Simulator: RhB Enhancement Pack 02 Add-On
description: Get ready for another helping of classic Arosa Line traction with the authentic RhB Enhancement Pack 02 for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: BR/LNER Class J50 Loco Add-On
description: The Gresley-designed Class J50 from Meshtools is now available for Train Simulator in a number of BR and LNER liveries.The origins of the Class J50 were in the Sir Nigel Gresley-designed Class J23, an 0-6-0T steam locomotive designed in 1913 for the purpose of working short-haul coal traffic in Yorkshire.

name: Nothing!: Impossible puzzle
description: Impossible pussle add-on.

name: Early Quest: Archipelago of Dragons
description: Visit the dragon archipelago and play its mini-games!

name: Early Quest: Elemental Power
description: In this expansion our group will discover the hidden secret of the elements in the world. Explore more hidden areas, talk to even stranger characters, learn new, more powerful spells, and more!

name: Early Quest: Tower Defense
description: Defend yourself from monster attack on a remote island in Early Quest!

name: Monkey Tantrum
description: A simple 2D shooter game. You will be alone and just try to be survive as long as you can. Your goal is to neutralize the enemies running towards you.

name: Virtual Amusement
description: Virtual Amusement is a single player VR puzzle game. You explore your own house and your imaginary world, find hidden objects and win mini-games to collect gems to find the key.

name: Lurker Legends
description: Lurker Legends is a Twitch-integrated game that allows streamers to play with their viewers. The viewers spawn monsters that the streamer has to fight while collecting gold around the map to buy upgrades like speed, attack damage, health etc...

name: Train Simulator 2021: OEBB 4744 'Cityjet' EMU
description: Get a taste of something modern with the state-of-the-art ÖBB (OEBB) 4744 'Cityjet' in Train Simulator 2021 in fully authentic fashion!

name: Train Simulator 2021: Settle to Carlisle Route
description: The Settle-Carlisle Expansion Pack is a superb modern recreation of this famous and beautiful British route, complete with 5 locomotives and rolling stock.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Norfolk Southern Dash8-40C Loco
description: As part of GE Transportation Systems' Dash 8 Series, the popular Dash8-40C is one of the most popular locomotives in the series, and is now available for Train Simulator 2021. Built by General Electric between 1987 and 1992, more than 500 Dash8-40C locomotives entered service for a number of US railroad companies.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Norfolk Southern SD45 High Hoods Loco
description: The popular EMD SD45 is now available for Train Simulator 2021 in three recognizable liveries of the Norfolk Southern Railway. Built between 1965 and 1971, the EMD SD45 was most at home hauling high-speed freight and intermodal services, although could occasionally be seen at the head of some passenger services.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Norfolk Southern GP60 Loco
description: As a powerful and versatile modern locomotive, the Norfolk Southern EMD GP60 is also authentically suited for service on a variety of additional Train Simulator routes 2021!

name: Train Simulator 2021: Southern Pacific SD45 Loco
description: The six-axle, 20 cylinder EMD SD 45 is now available for Train Simulator 2021 in Southern Pacific livery. Its powerful engine and versatility made the EMD SD 45 a popular class of locomotive among US railroads.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Union Pacific Big Boy Steam Loco
description: The ultimate experience of taking the throttle of American steam - big steam - awaits you with the magnificent and extraordinary Union Pacific 4-8-8-4 Big Boy now available for Train Simulator 2021!

name: Train Simulator 2021: GWR 1000 Class 'County Class' Steam Loco
description: GWR's 1000 "County" Class now available for Train Simulator 2021, is a unique example in Great Western two-cylinder design worked hard for years, and yours to take to Devonian rails!

name: Train Simulator 2021: LMS Rebuilt Patriot Class Steam Loco
description: Train Simulator 2021: LMS Rebuilt Patriot Class Steam Loco brings more classic steam to virtual life in Train Simulator 2021!

name: Train Simulator 2021: London Overground BR Class 313 EMU
description: Built to revolutionise suburban travel on newly electrified lines in Britain's capital, the Class 313 was the forerunner of British Rail's Second Generation production fleet and would start a history that is still being written to this day.

name: Train Simulator 2021: GWR 7800 'Manor' Class
description: Climb aboard classic steam power with Train Simulator 2021's DLC GWR 7800 'Manor' Class.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Return to Maerdy Loco
description: Train Simulator 2021: Return to Maerdy Loco is an add-on for Train Simulator 2021, complete with the unique English Electric Type 3B Battery Locomotive and WD Hunslet 0-6-0ST 'Austerity'.

name: Train Simulator 2021: LMS Coronation Class "Duchess of Hamilton" Loco
description: Once a record-breaking steam locomotive admired by many on the UK's rail network, the LMS Coronation Class 'Duchess of Hamilton' comes to Train Simulator 2021 in its striking streamlined variant. The LMS Coronation Class was a mainline steam locomotive designed by William Stanier and built at Crewe Works between 1937 and 1948.

name: Train Simulator 2021: North London & Goblin Lines
description: Stretching across North and East London, the Gospel Oak to Barking Line - affectionately known as the ‘GOBLIN’ - has grown into a major part of the extensive London Overground network; a network which has specialized in re-vitalizing neglected routes throughout the Capital, converting them into railways which are fit to serve modern-day.

name: Train Simulator 2021: DB BR 442 'Talent 2' EMU
description: The new generation BR 442 'Talent 2' comes to Train Simulator 2021, perfect for you to experience on the Munich - Garmisch-Partenkirchen route.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Norfolk Southern Heritage SD70ACes Loco
description: In 2012, Norfolk Southern celebrated its 30th anniversary and honored some of the railroads in its history by repainting 20 locomotives in 'fallen flag' liveries. Since the 1820s, hundreds of railroad companies were built, merged, reorganized and consolidated into what eventually became Norfolk Southern in 1982.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Union Pacific No. 119 Steam Loco
description: The captivating experiences of "Old West" American railroading awaits you with historic Union Pacific 4-4-0 No. 119 and its accompanying Cheyenne 1869 route for Train Simulator 2021.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Great Northern F7 'Empire Builder' Loco
description: The hugely popular EMD F7 has hauled some of North America's most celebrated passenger trains, including Great Northern's Empire Builder, and is now available in this famous consist and livery for Train Simulator 2021.

name: Train Simulator 2021: OEBB 5047 DMU
description: Experience the quaint ÖBB (OEBB) 5047, which has arrived for Train Simulator 2021!

name: Train Simulator 2021: OEBB 1014 Loco
description: The remarkable ÖBB (OEBB) 1014 has joined the Train Simulator 2021 library, and in doing so brings you a modern-classic to life in authentic detail to add to your collection.

name: Train Simulator 2021: PRR Baldwin Centipede Loco
description: The Baldwin Centipede was one of the more unusual and heavy diesel locomotives in US railroading history.

name: Train Simulator 2021: MRCE Dispolok Pack Loco
description: Bring powerful locomotives and hefty freight to life with the action-heavy MRCE Dispolok Pack! With a rich history and lots to play with, this pack is the perfect way to freshen up your collection.

name: Train Simulator 2021: OEBB 1293 Loco
description: Experience modern Austrian traction first hand, as the state-of-the-art ÖBB (OEBB) 1293 arrives for Train Simulator 2021!

name: Train Simulator 2021: Union Pacific GP30 Loco
description: At a time when US locomotive builders were vying for more horsepower, General Motors' Electro-Motive Division introduced the new generation GP30 that was later to become a hugely successful diesel-electric locomotive for many US Class I railroads.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Norfolk Southern SD40-2 High Nose Long Hood Forward Loco
description: General Motors' bestselling SD40-2 diesel locomotive comes to Train Simulator 2021 in Norfolk Southern black livery in its popular high nose, long hood variant. Around 4,000 models of the Dash 2 series locomotive were built between 1972 until 1989 as an upgrade to the SD40.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Metro-North Kawasaki M8 EMU
description: One of the newest electric multiple units for the Northeast Corridor comes to Train Simulator 2021 in Metro-North's familiar bare metal and red livery. Built by Kawasaki at Lincoln, Nebraska for use on the New Haven Line, the M8 first entered service in March 2011 as a replacement to the current fleet of M2, M4 and M6 multiple units.

name: Train Simulator 2021: PRR DR6-4-2000 & Broadway Limited Loco
description: The Pennsylvania Railroad was legendary - and this remarkable pack from DTM brings together two Pennsy classics - PRR’s distinctive Baldwin DR-6-4-2000 "passenger shark" diesels and the railroad's flagship passenger train, the Broadway Limited!

name: Train Simulator 2021: MRCE BR 185.5 Loco
description: The modular TRAXX locomotives from Bombardier have become one of Europe's most widespread family of locomotives and includes the BR 185.5, now available for Train Simulator 2021.

name: Train Simulator 2021: OEBB 1044 Loco
description: The ÖBB (OEBB) 1044 electric locomotive was built by ELIN, Siemens Mobility, Brown, Boveri & Cie. and Simmering-Graz-Pauker in the mid-1970s as a powerful solution to Austria's challenging rail network, being able to haul heavy freight or bustling passenger services anywhere from heaving cities to rural mountain passes with ease.

name: Train Simulator 2021: First Capital Connect Class 321 EMU
description: Considered to be one of the most reliable and trouble-free EMUs of the Mk3 family, the Class 321 is a popular commuter train operated by a number of companies across the UK, and now available for Train Simulator 2021 in First Capital Connect livery.

name: Train Simulator 2021: London Overground Class 378 'Capitalstar' EMU
description: One of the most modern electric multiple units (EMUs) for the London rail network comes to Train Simulator 2021, a perfect accompaniment for the South London Network route. The Class 378 'Capitalstar' was first introduced to service in 2009 to replace aging classes of EMUs in service around London.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Union Pacific GP50 Loco
description: The GP50 was the first model built by General Motors' Electro-Motive Division to be equipped with microprocessor controls, similar to GE's Dash 8 Series, which EMD saw as the main competitor to its own four-axle model.

name: Train Simulator 2021: San Diego Commuter Rail F59PHI Loco
description: Built by General Motors Electro-Motive Division, the F59PHI is most commonly used on passenger trains throughout North America. Most significantly, it was also the first train to meet California's strict emission standards, a feature that has seen its use across North America.

name: Train Simulator 2021: MRCE ES 64 U2 'Taurus' Loco
description: One of the most modern and most powerful locomotives for cargo and passenger transport in Europe has arrived for Train Simulator 2021. The MRCE ES 64 U2 'Taurus' is a new generation high performance electric locomotive built by Siemens between 2000 and 2008, and part of the second generation of Eurosprinter locomotives built by the company.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Koeln Airport Link Route Extension
description: Gear up for Planes, Trains and Stadtschnellbahns! The incredible Rhine Railway has linked Troisdorf and Cologne via both the impressive Gremberg yard and the Hohenzollern Bridge since 1874.

name: Train Simulator 2021: EWS Class 66 v2.0 Loco
description: When British Rail's freight operations were privatized in 1996, EWS brought most of BR's freight operations, including many locomotives that were unreliable or at the end of their useful life.

name: Train Simulator 2021: PRR RF-16 'Sharknose' Loco
description: The distinctive Baldwin RF-16 with 'Sharknose' design comes to Train Simulator 2021, from Digital Train Model. In 1948, Baldwin Locomotive Works began to apply a new 'Sharknose' body style to its cab unit diesel locomotives, partly to differentiate Baldwin locomotives from its competitors.

name: Train Simulator: UK Military Wagon Pack
description: Take charge of important rail operations with Train Simulator 2021's UK Military Wagon Pack.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Freightliner Class 57/0 Loco
description: The 'bodysnatching' Class 57/0 in Freightliner livery is now available for Train Simulator 2021. The Class 57/0 was introduced as a rebuilt version of the redundant Class 47, and externally both classes look the same.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Seaboard GE U36B Loco
description: The famous General Electric 'U-Boat' comes to Train Simulator 2021 in two distinctive Seaboard liveries. General Electric introduced its "Universal Series" diesel road-switchers in 1959, and over the following two decades more than 3,500 "U-Boats" - as the locomotives were nicknamed - were constructed.

name: Train Simulator 2021: LNER/BR Class J94 Loco
description: The Hunslet LNER/BR J94 saddle tank is now available for Train Simulator 2021.

name: Train Simulator 2021: GWR Steam Railmotor Loco
description: The unusually designed forerunner to more modern diesel and electric multiple units, the GWR Steam Railmotor, has arrived in Train Simulator 2021, offering one of the most unique driving experiences ever. In the early 1900s, the introduction of electric street tramcars and motor buses provided competition to suburban and branch line services.

name: Train Simulator 2021: NJ TRANSIT F40PH -2CAT Loco
description: Electro-Motive's F40PH line of diesel locomotives represented the face of North American passenger railroading for more than a generation. Between 1976 and the early 1990s, more than 400 of the highly successful 3,000- and 3,200-horsepower diesel locomotives were constructed and served in intercity and commuter service.

name: Train Simulator 2021: GWR Nunney Castle Steam Loco
description: One of the most well-liked and successful locomotives of the Great Western Railway, 5029 Nunney Castle depicted in preservation form, steams into Train Simulator 2021.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Duchess of Sutherland Loco
description: One of the most powerful passenger steam locomotives ever to be built for the British railway network - the Coronation Class 'Duchess of Sutherland' - comes to Train Simulator 2021 in its fantastically preserved BR Brunswick Green livery.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Virgin Trains BR Class 390 'Pendolino' EMU
description: Be enticed by the Class 390 'Pendolino' – one of the most intriguing trains ever built! Combining the contentious 'tilting' technology of the Advanced Passenger Train with Alstom's ETR 401s, the Pendolino was the first to bring comfortable tilting to British rails - and at speeds of up to 125mph!

name: Train Simulator 2021: Norfolk Southern Big 7s Loco
description: The Norfolk Southern Big 7s add-on brings two variations of the GE Dash 7 locomotive to Train Simulator 2021. The 3,600 horsepower four-axle GE B36-7 was built from 1980 until 1985 as successor to the famous U36B 'U-Boats'.

name: Train Simulator 2021: GP40-2 Loco Pack
description: The Electro-Motive GP40-2 has been a versatile workhorse of American railroading for more than four decades - and now the classic second-generation diesel locomotive comes to Train Simulator 2021 in the authentic liveries of five famed U.S. railroads!

name: Train Simulator 2021: LMS Stanier Class 5 'Black Five' Steam Loco
description: A total of 842 "Black Five" locomotives were built for the London, Midland and Scottish and later British Railways; and, a truly definitive add-on is unleashed, in the form of LMS Stanier Class 5!

name: Train Simulator 2021: LMS Class 3F 'Jinty' Loco
description: The diminutive Class 3F 'Jinty' 0-6-0 tank engine, designed by Henry Fowler and based on the Midland Railway Class 2441, is now available for Train Simulator 2021 in a number of LMS and BR liveries. In total, more than 400 of these locomotives were built between 1924 and 1931, originally for the London, Midland and Scottish Railway.

name: Train Simulator 2021: OEBB 4010 EMU
description: Traverse the landmark Semmeringbahn route in the newly unveiled ÖBB (OEBB) 4010, from noted Partner Programme developer RSSLO. This flagship of the ÖBB promises authenticity abounds as it arrives for Train Simulator 2021 service!

name: Train Simulator 2021: PRR Alco RS11 Loco
description: Built between 1956 and 1964, the RS-11 was Alco's answer to the EMD GP9 and was fitted with a turbo charger and had a heavy pulling power of 1,800hp, making it an ideal heavy freighter but also saw some passenger service in its lifetime.

name: Train Simulator 2021: NJ TRANSIT ALP-46 Loco
description: With a 1,000-mile route system, much of which is electrified with overhead AC catenary, commuter carrier NJ TRANSIT is one of North America’s primary employers of electric locomotives. Seeking a new fleet of state-of-the art electrics, NJ TRANSIT contracted with Adtranz (now part of Bombardier) in Kassel, Germany.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Southern Class 455/8 EMU
description: One of London's iconic commuter electric multiple units comes to Train Simulator 2021 in Southern Trains livery. Originally starting life as a Class 510, the Class 455/8 was introduced in 1982 to replace the aging 4SUB and 4EPB units. Class 455/8s were part of the first batch of units to be delivered between 1982 and 1984.

name: Train Simulator 2021: SW1500 Switcher Loco
description: The SW1500 is a classic example of a US yard switcher, and the different color schemes and variants.

name: Project CARS 3: Ignition Pack
description: Power up your passion with the Ignition Pack that comes fully-fueled and ready to get you into the race. Limited time offer.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Soldier Summit Scenario Pack 01
description: Rugged, challenging, and realistic western mountain railroading awaits you in Soldier Summit Scenario Pack 01.

name: Tower!3D Pro: LFPG Airport
description: Paris Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: EDDF Airport
description: EDDF Frankfurt International Airport - a major international airport located in Frankfurt, the fifth-largest city of Germany - is a DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: RJTT Airport
description: Tokyo International Airport commonly known as Haneda Airport, Tokyo Haneda Airport, and Haneda International Airport (IATA: HND, ICAO: RJTT), is a DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: OMDB Airport
description: Tower!3d Pro: OMDB Airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KDFW Airport
description: Tower!3D Pro: KDFW Airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KRDU Airport
description: Tower!3D Pro: KRDU Airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: EGLL Airport
description: Heathrow Airport, originally called London Airport until 1966 and now known as London Heathrow (IATA: LHR, ICAO: EGLL),

name: Tower!3D Pro: KIAD Airport
description: Washington Dulles International AirportIATA: IAD, ICAO: KIAD, FAAAn international airport in the Eastern United States, located in Loudoun County and Fairfax County in Virginia, 26 miles (42 km) west of Downtown Washington, D.C.

name: Tower!3D Pro: EKCH Airport
description: Copenhagen Airport, Kastrup EKCH is the main international airport serving Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Tower!3D Pro: YMML Airport
description: Tower!3D Pro: YMML Airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KMEM Airport
description: Memphis International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KLGA Airport
description: LaGuardia Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: CYVR Airport
description: Tower!3D Pro: CYVR Airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: LEBL Airport
description: Tower!3D Pro: LEBL Airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: WSSS Airport
description: Singapore Changi International Airport (WSSS) for the Tower!3D Pro air traffic control simulator game.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KPHX Airport
description: Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KLAS Airport
description: McCarran International Airport (Las Vegas) is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: EGKK Airport
description: Tower!3D Pro: EGKK Airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: LTFM Airport
description: Istanbul Airport is the main airport for Istanbul, Turkey. It was opened to the public in 2018. In 2019, all commercial passenger flights were transferred here from Istanbul Atatürk Airport. Now it can handle 200 million passengers a year.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KSAN Airport
description: San Diego Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KSFO Airport
description: San Francisco International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: EDDM Airport
description: Munich International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: FAOR Airport
description: O. R. Tambo International Airport north east of Johannesburg, South Africa. Originally called Jan Smuts International Airport (former ICAO code FAJS) then renamed Johannesburg International Airport in 1994 and then became O. R. Tambo International Airport in 2005, ICAO code changed to FAOR.

name: Tower!3D Pro: EDDS Airport
description: Tower!3D Pro: EDDS Airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KATL Airport
description: Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: PHNL Airport
description: Daniel K. Inouye International Airport (IATA: HNL, ICAO: PHNL), also known as Honolulu International Airport, is the principal aviation gateway of the City and County of Honolulu on Oahu of the State of Hawaii.

name: Tower!3D Pro: ZBAD Airport
description: Beijing Daxing International Airport (IATA: PKX, ICAO: ZBAD), ZBAD is Beijing's second international airport that has been nicknamed "the starfish" because of its look.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KJFK Airport
description: New York Kennedy International airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KMCO Airport
description: Orlando International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KBOS Airport
description: Logan International Airport (Boston) is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Train Simulator 2021: GWR Small Prairies Loco
description: As small mixed traffic branch locomotives, the Great Western Railway's Prairies were diminutive workhorses of the railway network, and are now available for Train Simulator 2021. The 2-6-2 tank engines were introduced to the GWR in 1904 with the 4400 Class, primarily for use on the railway's numerous hilly branch lines.

name: Train Simulator 2021: GWR Large Prairies Steam Loco
description: The distinctive and incredible GWR Large Prairies comes to Train Simulator 2021 to fulfill a multitude of steam-era roles.

name: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 2
description: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 2 includes three fairground thrill rides: Ghost Spin, Windmill, and Rotorcraft.

name: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 3
description: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 3 includes three fairground thrill rides: Tiki Jump, Meteor, and Mixer.

name: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 4
description: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 4 includes three fairground thrill rides: Flying Swing, Propeller, and Gambler.

name: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 6
description: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 6 includes three fairground thrill rides: Bobsled Race, Flying Acrobats, and Jungle Expedition.

name: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 5
description: Funfair Ride Simulator 3: Ride Pack 5 includes three fairground thrill rides: Salto, Starship, and The Reactor.

name: Train Simulator 2021: Grand Central Class 180 'Adelante' DMU
description: The iconic Class 180 'Adelante' speeds into Train Simulator 2021 in distinctive Grand Central Trains livery. The five-car sets were built by Alstom at their Washwood Heath plant between 2000 and 2001 for First Great Western, who wanted to increase the frequency of their express services between London Paddington and South Wales.

name: VRC Pro: Rally-X
description: This Rally-X (cross) expansion pack contains a high-performance R/C rally car and 8 awesome rally tracks. You also get a set of Rally-X car bodies and high-end components to configure and customize your car. Electric 1:8 Rally-X chassis. Full car setup options. Extra car bodies and components. 3 New Rally tracks.

name: VRC Pro: GT3 Chassis and Components
description: DLC containing the 1:8 nitro onroad GT3 Modified chassis, wheels, rubber tires, 3.5cc .21 engine, exhaust pipe and the beautiful new P911 GT3 and the C7 body which come different paintschemes with 8 color schemes. The modified RS chassis has full setup options, ideal for the die-hard nitro on-road racer to tune the chassis to his liking.

name: VRC Pro: Deluxe Cars
description: This VRC PRO: Deluxe Cars expansion pack gives you the 6 remaining high performance (modified) cars! Faster cars with improved control and full setup options. Access more online race events & series, multiplayer sessions and time-trial rankings.

name: Arcadian Rift
description: Fight as a space pirate in this sci-fi FPS adventure where you raid ships and gather an arsenal of weapons, gadgets, and upgrades to build your character. Use your gear to hunt down and destroy the four rogue AI who have conquered and occupy this lawless star system.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Pro Edition - Expansion Pack 10
description: Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 10 - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 10 is designed for adults.

description: Pastry Shop - Jigsaw Puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Pastry Shop - Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults and for kids.
