name: Shop Tycoon
description: Shop Tycoon lets you build, furnish and run your own shop. Hire employees, order goods and face various challenges on the way to success! Develop your business, discover new districts and try to meet the expectations of new customers.

name: Hearts of Iron III: US Pack
description: The US spritepack adds 17 more US sprites in the game. You will se among other things, the Iowa Class battleship, the B-29 Super Fortress and the M4/E8 Sherman Medium Tank. 8 new ships: BB: Iowa Class CV: Essex Class BB: North Carolina Class CV: Lexington class SS: Gato Class Submarine CL: Brooklyn Class CA: Baltimore Class DD: Fletcher...

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Fame and Strategy Expansion Pack
description: Live the Three Kingdoms with extreme Officer Play! "Romance of the Three Kingdoms 13" celebrates the 30th Anniversary of the series and has achieved the greatest advances in the history of the series.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Additional Scenario - The God of War, Surrounded
description: The scenario "The God of War, Surrounded" will be added.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Best Scenario for RTK Japan - The Tyrant Returns
description: "The Tyrant Returns," the winner of the Original Scenario Contest held within Japan during October of 2016, will be added to the game.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Additional Scenario - Campaign Against Lu Bu
description: The scenario "The Campaign Against Lu Bu" will be added.

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Additional Scenario - Thirteen Heroes
description: The scenario "Thirteen Heroes" will be added.

name: The Warlock of Firetop Mountain: Goblin Scourge!
description: The Goblin Scourge has arrived. Unlock three new heroes, six playable monsters and an explosive new location for The Warlock of Firetop Mountain!

name: Real-time Tactical 2D
description: Play against challenging CPU in this beautiful retro 2D version

name: Hearts of Iron III: Soviet Pack
description: The Soviet spritepack adds 16 more Soviet sprites in the game. 8 New Tanks: BT-5 BT-7 T-28 T-34 T-44 KV-1 KV-2 IS-2 5 New Aircraft: Mig-3 Mig-9 Lagg-3 Yak-4 Sukhoi SU-2 3 New Ships: Gangut-class Battleship Kirov-class Heavy Cruiser Leningrad-class Destroyer

name: Hearts of Iron III: Axis Minors Vehicle Pack
description: Enhance your Hearts of Iron III experience with the Axis Minors Vehicle Pack. This pack contains 28 new skins for 12 vehicles to be used by the Axis Minor nations in World War II. Included in this pack are vehicles for Hungaria, Bulgaria, Romania and Slovakia.

name: Hearts of Iron III: Italian Vehicle Pack
description: Enhance your Hearts of Iron III experience with the Italian Vehicle Pack. This pack contains 16 new vehicles for the Italian Army, Navy and Air Force. Included in this vehicle pack are iconic Italian tanks such as the Fiat-Ansaldo L6/40, the Macchi C.200 Saetta fighter and the CANT Z.1007 Alcione medium bomber.

name: Train Simulator: BR Standard Class 6 'Clan Class' Steam Loco Add-On
description: Recount the bygone era of Pacifics in Scotland, and provide a glimpse into the potential future where 72010 is brought to life in this exquisite Just Trains Pro-Range Add-on for Train Simulator! Following the nationalisation of Britain's 'Big Four' railway companies into British Railways in 1948, it was decided that many new steam...

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific SD9043MAC Loco Add-On
description: Climb aboard for some heavy freight-hauling - with the distinctive Union Pacific Electro-Motive SD9043MAC for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: Metronom ME 146 Loco Add-On
description: The distinctive Metronom ME 146 is a great add-on for Train Simulator players looking to expand their fleet of German passenger trains, complete with matching double-deck (Doppelstockwagen) coaches and driveable cab car (Steuerwagen).

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 50 Loco Add-On
description: The Type 4 Class 50 'Hoovers' were an express passenger locomotive that worked on much of the UK's railway network. Fifty of the Class were built in the late 1960s by English Electric at Vulcan Foundry Works and were exclusively used on the then non-electrified West Coast Main Line between Crewe,...

name: Train Simulator: GWR Star Loco Add-On
description: In the late 1890s the Great Western Railway were seeking new locomotives as part of their post-broad gauge conversion modernization. The newly appointed Chief Mechanical Engineer of the GWR, George Jackson Churchward, sought out designs for modern steam locomotives that could serve the Western network far into the future.

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 402 '2-HAL' EMU Add-On
description: The Southern Railway's 2-HAL, a once-classic on the commuter scene, makes a comeback in this detailed add-on for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: Southern Pacific GP20 Loco Add-On
description: The second generation EMD GP20 ushered in a new era of turbocharged locomotives on American railroads, and now this 2,000hp heavy freight hauler is available for Train Simulator in Southern Pacific livery.

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific Challenger Loco Add-On
description: The mighty Union Pacific Challenger 4-6-6-4 for Train Simulator, featuring four exciting and challenging scenarios specially created for the Sherman Hill route.

name: Train Simulator: Southern Railway S15 Class Steam Loco Add-On
description: Take control of an icon of Southern steam as the Southern S15 is now yours to enjoy in Train Simulator, courtesy of Partner Programme Developer, Bossman Games.

name: Train Simulator: Boston & Maine GE 44 Loco Add-On
description: The demise of steam traction in North America during the 1940s saw the birth of the hard-working GE 44 Tonner switcher, now available for Train Simulator in the livery of Boston & Maine, one of the most dominant railroads of the northern New England region.

name: Train Simulator: CSX AC6000CW Loco Add-On
description: One of the most powerful single-engine diesel locomotives in the World comes to Train Simulator, the General Electric AC6000CW.

name: Train Simulator: CSX SD80MAC Loco Add-On
description: Packing 5,000 horsepower and a 20-cylinder engine, the SD80MAC was a regular coal hauler across Pennsylvania, and is now here in CSX livery for Train Simulator. Thirty units were built by EMD for Conrail between 1995 and 1996 and were the first diesel locomotives to use a 20-cylinder engine since EMD's SD45 and SD45-2 models.

name: Train Simulator: Epic Journeys
description: Master your Machines with Train Simulator: Epic Journeys EditionEnjoy these three epic routes:SOLDIER SUMMITThe stunning plains and valley passes of Utah make Soldier Summit one of the best loved mountain passes of the western United States.

name: Train Simulator: London Transport Heritage Collection
description: London Transport's finest comes to Train Simulator with the London Transport Heritage Pack, featuring classic capital traction for you to enjoy. 1938 Tube StockAs their name suggests, the 1938 Stock was first introduced on deep-level 'Tube' lines shortly before the start of the Second World War.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 145 Loco Add-On
description: The TRAXX series of electric locomotives from Bombardier is responsible for many of Germany's more modern freight and passenger locomotives, including the BR 145, now available for Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: SD40-2 Independence Loco Add-On
description: The ever popular EMD SD40-2 is now on Train Simulator in a unique red, white and blue livery as operated by Union Pacific. More than 4,000 models were built by General Motors' Electro-Motive Division EMD between 1972 and 1989, as part of the company's Dash 2 series.

name: Train Simulator: PRR FA-1 & FA-2 Loco Add-On
description: DTM has now brought this long-awaited first-generation diesel classic – in Pennsylvania's classic Brunswick Green "single stripe" livery – to Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: DB ICE 3 EMU Add-On
description: The ICE 3 is a fantastic new-generation high speed train introduced in 2000, and now you can take on the challenge of driving this serious train yourself!

name: Train Simulator: GWR 4200/5205/7200 2-8-0T Pack
description: Step into the cab of a trio of Great Western Railway's hard-working tank engines, the original 4200, improved 5205 and huge 7200 classes, all brought to life in Train Simulator by Victory Works!

name: Train Simulator: Network SouthEast Class 159 DMU Add-On
description: As part of British Rail's popular Sprinter family of diesel multiple units, Class 159s were a popular sight on south west services from the UK's capital to the west of England.

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific FEF-3 Loco Add-On
description: The final steam locomotive built for Union Pacific, the FEF-3, comes to Train Simulator from Smokebox with an extensive array of detailing and features.The FEF was a class of three steam locomotives built by the American Locomotive Company (Alco) and operated by Union Pacific Railroad.

name: Train Simulator: South Wales Coastal: Bristol - Swansea Route Add-on
description: Directly connecting England and Wales, running under the longest river in the United Kingdom, the South Wales Main Line is one of the most important cross-border routes in the country, and over 80 miles of it can be explored in South Wales Coastal!

name: Train Simulator: Dispolok BR 189 Loco Add-On
description: The new-generation high performance BR 189 comes from the stable of successful Euro Sprinter locomotives built by Siemens, and is now available for Train Simulator.Classified as BR 189 by Deutsche Bahn, the Class is one of only a handful equipped with all four electric systems commonly used in mainland Europe and various light...

name: Train Simulator: Class 2F Dock Tank Loco Add-On
description: The diminutive Class 2F Dock Tank is here for Train Simulator, developed by MeshTools.The 0-6-0T short wheelbase tank engine was designed by Sir Henry Fowler for the London, Midland and Scottish Railway (LMS) who were responsible for operating lines on a number of docks.

name: Train Simulator: Trainload BR Class 60 Loco Add-On
description: While they have a chequered career, one cannot deny the power that a Class 60 can put down on the rails; having earned the nickname "Tug" from enthusiasts as it's what they do best, and now you can put them to work on heavy freight duty. Experience the might of the BR Class 60 in Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: LMS Rebuilt Royal Scot Steam Loco Add-On
description: Originally built in the late 1920s, the Royal Scot class of locomotive would see a radical change in their lives to become almost entirely new, Stanier-derived designs. Continuing their fantastic LMS line-up, Bossman Games have delivered yet another engine you need to have in your collection!

name: Train Simulator: DB BR424 EMU Add-On
description: The S-Bahn routes of Hanover are regularly served by the Class 424 electric multiple unit and are an ideal commuter train to accommodate the high volume of commuters passing through the City. Constructed from 1998 onwards, the Class 424 is similar in appearance to the DB Class 425 and 423 trainsets, but are better suited to the low...

name: Train Simulator: UPRR Idaho & Omaha Steam Loco Add-On
description: Smokebox brings to Train Simulator two more classic 4-4-0 "Americans" - Union Pacific sister locomotives No. 7, the "Omaha," and No. 8, the "Idaho."

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 181.2 Loco Add-on
description: This notable example of classic German electric traction, which has done duty for over 40 years is ready for you to command.

name: Train Simulator: ScotRail Class 380 EMU Add-On
description: The Class 380 electric multiple unit is a great modern image British train, and runs on the Glasgow Airport Rail Link route (also available for Train Simulator). A total of 38 Class 380 sets were ordered for introduction on electrified routes in Scotland. The 38 units comprise a total of 130 vehicles forming a mixture of 3 and 4 car sets.

name: Train Simulator: InterCity BR Class 370 ‘APT-P’ Loco Add-On
description: Grow your collection with an iconic piece of British Rail history: the infamous Advanced Passenger Train Prototype.

name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern C39-8 Loco Add-On
description: Take control of pure power with the latest entry to our Pro Range! Created in exacting detail and with a variety of realistic operating features, the Norfolk Southern General Electric C39-8 is a six-axle (C-C), 390,000-pound, 3,900-horsepower locomotive capable of tying onto the heaviest unit coal trains, yet also able to hustle...

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 4020 EMU Add-On
description: Introduced to handle commuter traffic right up until the turn of the century, and beyond, the ÖBB 4020 reigned supreme throughout Austria's key passenger routes - from the bustling cities to the rural mountain passes. Experience life in the cab of this classic unit as the ÖBB 4020 is ready for Train Simulator service!

name: Train Simulator: Merchant Navy Class 35028 'Clan Line' Steam Loco Add-On
description: Operate iconic Steam excursions across Britain with Bossman Games' Merchant Navy Class 35028 'Clan Line', as preserved today in the classic BR Green livery!

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 35 Loco Add-On
description: The mixed-traffic Class 35 diesel-hydraulic locomotive is now available for Train Simulator in BR green livery. The hydraulic transmission fitted to the Class 35 locomotives gave them their affectionate nickname of 'Hymeks' and, at the time they were built, were the most powerful diesel-hydraulic locomotive operating with a single engine.

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 24 Loco Add-On
description: As the first diesel locomotives to be built at BR's Darlington Works, the Class 24 was built as part of the British Rail Modernisation Plan in the late 1950s. The Class 24 was a Sulzer Type 2, Bo-Bo diesel-electric locomotive built between 1958 and 1961, incorporating numerous elements such as off-the-shelf standardised components used...

name: Train Simulator: D&RGW SD9 Loco Add-On
description: As one of the most unique and iconic six axle heavy yard switchers, the EMD SD9 was a popular locomotive among North American railfans.The EMD SD9 was a 1,750hp six-axle (C-C) diesel road-switcher powered by EMDs highly successful two-stroke 567C V-16 diesel power plant.

name: Train Simulator: Western Pacific FP7 ‘California Zephyr’ Loco Add-On
description: The California Zephyr – the train many enthusiasts and railroaders alike considered the single-most magnificent passenger train to ever journey across America now for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: Canadian National SD60 Loco Add-On
description: The Canadian National EMD SD60 is a powerful, stylish train, now available for Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: Chessie System U30C Loco Add-On
description: General Electric established itself as an independent builder of mainline diesel locomotives in 1959 with its 2,500-horsepower U25B, and throughout the 1960s and into the 1970s, GE produced an ever-expanding - and more powerful - line of "Universal"-series diesels, which came to be widely nicknamed as U-boats.

name: Train Simulator: Class 390 EMU Add-On
description: The Class 390 is a modern classic, and you can experience the speed of this powerful tilting express train from the driver's seat in Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 103 TEE Loco Add-On
description: The DB Class 103 operated by DB, was considered the flagship of the DB fleet for a long period. It was up until 1987 that this locomotive monopolized high speed trains in Germany. It is one of the most powerful conventional electric locomotives ever built, with a one hour rating of 10,400KW or 13,900HP.

name: Train Simulator: CRH2A EMU Add-On
description: Authentically crafted high-speed action awaits you with the striking CRH2A for Train Simulator! Experience an integral part of the Chinese railway network's modern history with this revolutionary locomotive.

name: Train Simulator: BR DP1 Deltic Loco Add-On
description: The powerful and impressive BR DP1 Deltic evokes the UK's glorious railway heritage, and this attractive prototype diesel locomotive is now available for Train Simulator. The amalgamation of engine manufacturer Napier & Sons and locomotive builder English Electric in 1942 opened up the potential to use the powerful Napier Deltic...

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 14 Loco Add-On
description: The single six-cylinder engine locomotives were built in the mid-1960s by BR's Swindon Works, with the intention of working in shunting yards and short distance freight trains.

name: Train Simulator: Freightliner Class 70 Loco Add-On
description: The Class 70 is one of the most distinctive UK diesel locomotive designs of all time.

name: Train Simulator: BR Blue Pack Loco Add-On
description: The classic Rail Blue livery of British Rail from the 1960s typified the heyday of diesel traction across the UK's railway network, as depicted in this collection of diesel locomotives for the Weardale & Teesdale Network.

name: Train Simulator: GWR 56XX Loco Add-On
description: Beautifully modelled with highly accurate controls and cab features, the 56xx tank locomotive is one of the most realistic steam driving experiences available for Train Simulator.The origins of the 56xx Class locomotive lie among the coal mines of South Wales, where the 0-6-2 locomotive configuration was proved to handle the...

name: Train Simulator: SP&S E-1 Class 'Northern' Loco Add-On
description: This DLC is only available to purchase in the USA. The SP&S E-1 Class 'Northerns' add a touch of nostalgia to Train Simulator - jump in the cab and recreate that 1930s West Coast flavour.

name: Train Simulator: EWS Class 92 Loco Add-On
description: The dual voltage Class 92 electric locomotive is now available for Train Simulator in the privatised livery of English, Welsh & Scottish Railway (EWS) livery.The Class was built by a consortium of Brush Traction and ABB Traction between 1993 and 1996 with the intention of running services through the Channel Tunnel between Britain...

name: Train Simulator: BR Class 73 'Gatwick Express' Loco Add-On
description: The unique Class 73 remains the only electro-diesel locomotive to be seen on the UK's rail network, and now comes to Train Simulator in InterCity Gatwick Express livery, complete with the Class 488 and Class 489 to recreate authentic Gatwick Express services.

name: Train Simulator 2021: KwaZulu-Natal Corridor - Pietermaritzburg-Ladysmith
description: The latest route for Train Simulator captures the rugged beauty of South Africa. This route will take you on a 3'6" Cape gauge line through twenty six stations or halts on the way. Experience a range of terrain, from lush green plantations, winding rivers, traversing gorges, numerous tunnels, mountain sides, deep valleys and open plains.

name: Train Simulator: Salt Lake City Route Extension Add-On
description: Train Simulator's Soldier Summit route has been a favorite since its release in 2015 – and now a captivating extension to the route, continuing west to Salt Lake City, is available for Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: USATC S160 Loco Add-On
description: The US ATC S160 includes an Advanced Pro-Series version and also includes a HUD/Xbox controller-compatible version.A truly international add-on for Train Simulator, the USATC S160 recreates a diverse class of steam locomotives that were designed, built and, in some cases, lost forever in very quick time.

name: Train Simulator: BR Castle Class Loco Add-On
description: One of the most well-liked and successful locomotives of the Great Western Railway, the Castle Class, speeds into Train Simulator in gleaming BR Brunswick Green liveries.Originally designed by Charles Collett, Chief Mechanical Engineer for the Great Western Railway, the origins of the Castle Class were in the Star Class of 1907, which...

name: Train Simulator: AT&N Consolidation Class 280-157 Loco Add-On
description: The AT&N Class 280-157 'Consolidation' was a freight locomotive operating on a short railroad in the Deep South of the USA. The Class 280-157 was built by Lima Locomotive Works for the Alabama, Tennessee and Northern Railroad (AT&N).

name: Train Simulator 2021: DB Freight - 1970s Loco
description: The DB Freight: 1970s Add-On enables fans of German railways to expand their freight operations and recreate typical German freight trains from the 1970s.

name: Train Simulator: BR 9F Loco Add-On
description: Considered by some to be the pinnacle of British steam locomotive design, the Class 9F comes to Train Simulator in British Railways black livery.The Standard Class 2-10-0 locomotive was designed by Robert Riddles for BR and was the last in a series of standardised locomotive classes designed in the 1950s.

name: Train Simulator: RhB Enhancement Pack 04 Add-On
description: From the talent that is Rivet Games, their next Swiss expansion comes in the form of the RhB Enhancement Pack 04!

name: Train Simulator: LMS 5XP Jubilee Class Steam Loco Add-On
description: A total of 191 LMS 5XP locos were built by the London, Midland and Scottish Railway between 1934 and 1936, becoming one of the most-loved express passenger designs of all time - a must have for any steam lover's Train Simulator collection!

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 10 Steam Loco Add-On
description: Experience the grace and elegance of classic German steam locomotion in the form of the DR BR 10, available now for Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: Class 156 Loco Add-On
description: The Class 156 DMU, also known as a Super Sprinter, was built from 1987 to 1989 by Metro-Cammell as part of the effort to replace the ageing fleet of first-generation DMUs dating back to the 1950s. The Class 156s were all built as two-car sets, each set comprising a pair of driving motor units.

name: Train Simulator: BR Blue Diesel Electric Pack Loco Add-On
description: Synonymous with the most recognizable period in British Rail’s history, the 'Rail Blue' livery carried across BR's roster of diesel and electric locomotives and multiple units stretched across three decades, as represented in this collection of BR Blue diesel and electric locomotives for Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 612 DMU Add-On
description: Created to fill a critical gap in the Deustche Bahn fleet, the DB BR 612 is here! Take control of a key piece of tilting diesel technology and put it through it's paces on the Mosel Valley Koblenz-Trier Route Add-On.

name: Train Simulator: Powerhaul Class 66 V2.0 Loco Add-On
description: The Canadian-built Class 66 is a common sight across the UK's freight network, and now the Powerhaul liveried 'Shed' is available for Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: Network SouthEast Class 415 '4EPB' EMU Add-On
description: Slam door multiple units were a much loved and classic sight on the UK capital's rail network from the 1950s onwards, and now one such unit - the Class 415 '4EPB' - comes to Train Simulator, perfect for the South London Network route.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR423 EMU Add-On
description: The BR423 is a familiar sight on Germany's city commuter routes and this popular EMU (electric multiple unit) is ideal for running passenger services on your German routes in Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: PRR K4 Loco Add-On
description: The PRR K4 steam locomotive is a true American classic, and is the ideal companion to our Horseshoe Curve Expansion Pack which captures the glory days.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 101 Loco Add-On
description: The DB BR 101 is a classic among the modern electric locomotives of Germany, with heritage spanning some of the nation's most revolutionary designs and continuing the honour by working throughout the Deutsche Bahn network every day.

name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern Heritage ES44ACs Loco Add-On
description: In 2012, Norfolk Southern celebrated its 30th anniversary and honoured some of the railroads in its history by repainting 20 locomotives in 'fallen flag' liveries. Since the 1820s, hundreds of railroad companies were built, merged, reorganised and consolidated into what eventually became Norfolk Southern in 1982.

name: Train Simulator: RhB Enhancement Pack 03 Add-On
description: Revisit stunning Switzerland with the RhB Enhancement Pack 03, which features the classic and complex ABe 4/4 III railcar.

name: Train Simulator: Gatwick Express BR Class 460 'Juniper' EMU Add-On
description: The phenomenal BR Class 460, to exquisitely detailed Pro Range standard, brings the most authentic representation of Gatwick Express services yet for Train Simulator, courtesy of Partner Programme developer, Master Key Simulations!

name: Train Simulator: BNSF SD75 Loco Add-On
description: The SD75 is a great new BNSF locomotive to keep your freight rolling on the Cajon Pass!

name: Train Simulator: EWS Class 67 Loco Add-On
description: The Class 67 is a very distinctive UK freight locomotive which can also turn its hand to passenger work, and now you can take control of this powerhouse in Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern GP38-2 High Hood Loco Add-On
description: The general purpose GP38-2 road switcher joins the Norfolk Southern stable for Train Simulator.As the successor to the previous GP38, more than 2,000 GP38-2 models were built by General Motors between 1972 and 1986.

name: Train Simulator: Southern Pacific SD70M Loco Add-On
description: The vast number of SD70 diesel locomotives produced since the early 1990s has seen the Class become one of the most popular diesel models seen on the US rail network, and the SD70M is now available for Train Simulator in Southern Pacific livery.

name: Train Simulator: South West Trains Class 444 EMU Add-On
description: The Class 444 is a superb modern image EMU for the Portsmouth Direct Line, and comes complete with Portsmouth Direct Line scenarios.

name: Train Simulator: Freightliner Class 66 v2.0 Loco Add-On
description: The heavyweight of UK freight is coming! The updated General Motors built Freightliner Class 66 V2.0 'Shed' is now available for Train Simulator, with scenarios for the Edinburgh-Glasgow route.

name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific Big Boy Loco Add-On
description: The Union Pacific Railroad's Big Boy 4-8-8-4 steam locomotive is undoubtedly the beast of American railroading history, and this epitome of heavy haulage is now available for Train Simulator with a number of challenging scenarios for the Sherman Hill route.

name: Train Simulator: LNER Peppercorn Class A2 'Blue Peter' Loco Add-On
description: Master the controls of the last surviving Peppercorn A2 Class locomotive, Blue Peter, and return this famous locomotive to the rails in Train Simulator.The Arthur Peppercorn designed A2 Class locomotive is the sole survivor of the 15 locomotives in the class, built at Doncaster Works between 1947 and 1948.

name: Train Simulator: DB BR 361 Loco Add-On
description: The diminutive DB BR 361 packs a punch when it comes to serious pulling power, and is now available for shunting duties on Germany's rail network in Train Simulator.

name: Train Simulator: Network SouthEast Class 121 DMU Add-On
description: Arguably the most useful of first generation diesel multiple units (DMUs), the Class 121 'Bubble Car' comes to Train Simulator in distinctive Network SouthEast livery. The unusual single-car units were manufactured by Pressed Steel Company from 1960 onwards and introduced by British Rail for use mainly on the Western Region.

name: Train Simulator: BR Standard Class 4MT
description: While the roaring fires of the Standard Class 4 Moguls have mostly gone out, the preserved examples are not the only thing left to remember them by, for Just Trains have recreated this workhorse within Train Simulator!

name: Train Simulator: BR Rebuilt West Country & Battle of Britain Class Steam Loco Add-On
description: Experience the workhorse of the Southern Railway in full authenticity with Bossman Games' stunning BR Rebuilt West Country & Battle of Britain Class locomotives!

name: Fernbus Simulator: Usedom
description: The island of Usedom is the first free DLC for Fernbus Simulator and contains two completely new destinations: The seaside resort of Ahlbeck and the town of Usedom.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Football Team Bus
description: In the add-on Football Team Bus, you can choose one of 18 football clubs based on the German football league and drive its players to their guest matches. All stadiums have been recreated to the smallest detail – just as the liveries for the team busses of all clubs of the current football season 18/19.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Neoplan Skyliner
description: The journey continues: the first DLC for the popular Fernbus Coach Simulator features the Neoplan Skyliner! This “King of the Road” is a special luxury coach in the real world and of course in this simulation.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Rennsteig
description: This free DLC adds the Rennsteig to Central Germany as a new destination for you and your passengers.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Austria/Switzerland
description: The first map expansion for Fernbus Simulator connects the Alpine countries, Switzerland and Austria, seamlessly and without any loading sequence to the existing Map of Germany.

name: Fernbus Simulator: VDL Futura FHD2
description: This DLC brings the whole range of the VDL Futura FHD2 - in all six variations - to your fleet.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Rhine Gorge
description: The Rhine Gorge is part of the UNESCO World Heritage Sites since June 2002 for its unique combination of geological, historical, cultural and industrial features. Now, this area is available in Fernbus Simulator too and you can explore its winding curves along the River Rhine between the new cities of Rüdesheim and Koblenz.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Man Lion's Coach 3rd Gen
description: This DLC package expands your fleet with the MAN Lion's Coach 3rd Gen in all four variants: Lion's Coach, Lion's Coach C (two-axle), Lion's Coach C (three-axle) and Lion's Coach L.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Multimedia Package
description: FlashBass FM is a fictional German-speaking radio station broadcasting all over Germany with a wide variety of mainstream music, free of ads with a professional moderation including Jingles, Small Talk and an interactive Traffic Report, Weather forecast and new obstacles along on the roads!

name: Fernbus Simulator: Comfort Class HD
description: 5 fully functional, detailed variants of the ComfortClass HD with numerous Features. A unique driving experience with an extensive fleet of coaches.

name: Fernbus Simulator: BB40
description: The BB40 is a classic minibus and the perfect choice for the transportation of small groups of passengers! It's manoeuvrability, efficiency and agility compared to larger buses make it ideal for your first trips and even later for fast-paced routes.

name: Fernbus Simulator: W906
description: The W906 is a top-class minibus that reliably and comfortably brings your passengers to their destination. It is not only an economical entry-level vehicle for your fleet but also a leap in travel quality for your passengers.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Scania Touring
description: This DLC package adds the Scania Touring in all three versions - 121, 129 and 137 - to your vehicle pool.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Man Lion's Intercity
description: This DLC package adds the MAN Lion's Intercity in all three versions - R60, R61 and R62 - to your vehicle pool.

name: Tales of Finariel: Card based RPG
description: Forge your destiny in Legends of Finariel, a card based hand-drawn RPG. Defeat monsters, gather items and develop new abilities to unlock all the cards you will need to become the best challenger Finariel has and will ever know.

name: Suspect Enemy
description: Team game for 5-10 people in which there is a killer and crew.

name: The Wayward Realms
description: Under the direction of Ted Peterson and Julian LeFay, lead developers of the team behind the original Elder Scrolls, Arena and Daggerfall, OnceLost Games is creating a new open-world fantasy RPG where choice and consequence are experienced on a scale never attempted before.

name: Tiger Striker: MP005
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. This DLC include map pack 005.

name: Tiger Striker: MP003
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. This DLC include map pack 003.

name: Tiger Striker: MP001
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. This DLC include map pack 001.

name: Heroes & Generals: SU Soldier Pack - Infantry Medic
description: This Soldier pack includes a Medic Soldier Specialist, tailored for efficient infantry support. With a fully automatic top of the line submachine gun, this pack will be sure to inspire any true medic.

name: Heroes & Generals: GE Soldier Pack - Infantry Medic
description: This Soldier pack includes a Medic Soldier Specialist, tailored for efficient infantry support. With a fully automatic top of the line submachine gun, this pack will be sure to inspire any true medic.

name: Heroes & Generals: SU Soldier Pack - Infantry Anti-Tank
description: This Soldier Pack includes an Anti-Tank Soldier Specialist. This soldier carries anti-tank gears such as mines and launchers which are sure to induce fear in all tankers.

name: Heroes & Generals: US Soldier Pack - Infantry Medic
description: This Soldier pack includes a Medic Soldier Specialist, tailored for efficient infantry support. With a fully automatic top of the line submachine gun, this pack will be sure to inspire any true medic.

name: Heroes & Generals: GE Soldier Pack - Infantry Assault
description: This Soldier pack includes an Assault Soldier Specialist, the absolute best for leading an assault in any combat situation. Leading an assault can be dangerous and flanking routes are needed - one of the two vehicles included in this pack is a mobile spawn vehicle.

name: Heroes & Generals: US Soldier Pack - Infantry Anti-Tank
description: This Soldier Pack includes an Anti-Tank Soldier Specialist. This soldier carries anti-tank gears such as mines and launchers which are sure to induce fear in all tankers.

name: Heroes & Generals: US Soldier Pack - Infantry Assault
description: This Soldier pack includes an Assault Soldier Specialist, the absolute best for leading an assault in any combat situation. Leading an assault can be dangerous and flanking routes are needed - one of the two vehicles included in this pack is a mobile spawn vehicle.

name: Heroes & Generals: SU Soldier Pack - Medium Tanker
description: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Medium Tank arsenal, these 4 mean warmachines are ready to challenge heavy armored targets, take on any medium armor, destroy light armor and put a stop to infantry. This pack is perfect for the Tanker who is looking for a powerful approach.

name: Heroes & Generals: GE Soldier Pack - Medium Tanker
description: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Medium Tank arsenal, these 4 mean warmachines are ready to challenge heavy armored targets, take on any medium armor, light armor and put a stop to infantry. This pack is perfect for the Tanker who is looking for a powerful approach.

name: Heroes & Generals: SU Mega Pack
description: The Mega Pack includes one of each Soldier type + 1 Additional Infantry Soldier. Each soldier comes with high tier equipment along many modifications and 13 upgraded vehicles including Tanks, Planes and Terrain Vehicles.

name: Heroes & Generals: US Super Pack
description: The Super Pack includes one of each Soldier type. Each soldier comes with medium tier equipment along many modifications and 10 upgraded vehicles including Tanks, Planes and Terrain Vehicles.

name: Heroes & Generals: GE Mega Pack
description: The Mega Pack includes one of each Soldier type + 1 Additional Infantry Soldier. Each soldier comes with high tier equipment along many modifications and 13 upgraded vehicles including Tanks, Planes and Terrain Vehicles.

name: Heroes & Generals: SU Soldier Pack - Heavy Tanker
description: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Heavy Tank arsenal, these 3 colossus warmachines are composed of hardened steel and explosive gunpowder. They will take on any armored vehicle used in World War 2 and suppress all enemy infantry in its area.

name: Heroes & Generals: US Mega Pack
description: The Mega Pack includes one of each Soldier type + 1 Additional Infantry Soldier. Each soldier comes with high tier equipment along many modifications and 13 upgraded vehicles including Tanks, Planes and Terrain Vehicles.

name: Heroes & Generals: SU Super Pack
description: The Super Pack includes one of each Soldier type. Each soldier comes with medium tier equipment along many modifications and 10 upgraded vehicles including Tanks, Planes and Terrain Vehicles.

name: Heroes & Generals: US Giga Pack
description: The Giga Pack includes one Officer of each Soldier Type + 2 Additional Infantry Officer Soldiers. Each Officer allows you to get Assault Teams to control and deploy in the war. Each soldier comes with the highest tier equipment along modifications for weapons and access to 15 vehicles.

name: Heroes & Generals: GE Giga Pack
description: The Giga Pack includes one Officer of each Soldier Type + 2 Additional Infantry Officer Soldiers. Each Officer allows you to get Assault Teams to control and deploy in the war. Each soldier comes with the highest tier equipment along modifications for weapons and access to 15 vehicles.

name: Heroes & Generals: GE Soldier Pack - Light Tanker
description: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Light Tank arsenal, 3 tanks armed and ready to take on your enemy. Their size and ability matches their intention, challenge medium armored tanks and go head to head in combat against light armored vehicles and suppress the enemy infantry!

name: Heroes & Generals: SU Soldier Pack - Light Tanker
description: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Light Tank arsenal, 3 tanks armed and ready to take on your enemy. Their size and ability matches their intention, challenge medium armored tanks and go head to head in combat against light armored vehicles and suppress the enemy infantry!

name: Heroes & Generals: US Soldier Pack - Light Tanker
description: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Light Tank arsenal, 3 tanks armed and ready to take on your enemy. Their size and ability matches their intention, challenge medium armored tanks and go head to head in combat against light armored vehicles and suppress the enemy infantry!

name: Heroes & Generals: US Soldier Pack - Heavy Tanker
description: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Heavy Tank arsenal, these 3 colossus warmachines are composed of hardened steel and explosive gunpowder. They will take on any armored vehicle used in World War 2 and suppress all enemy infantry in its area.

name: Heroes & Generals: US Soldier Pack - Medium Tanker
description: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Medium Tank arsenal, these 4 mean warmachines are ready to challenge heavy armored targets, take on any medium armor, destroy light armor and put a stop to infantry. This pack is perfect for the Tanker who is looking for a powerful approach.

name: Lethal Pongbat
description: Pong with lazers & power-ups!

name: Override: Mech City Brawl - Maestro
description: Conducting absolute mayhem on the battlefield is Maestro, Override: Mech City Brawl’s 2nd DLC mech - a musical genius who uses a complicated combination of notes to chase and damage enemies.

name: Dwarfs F2P: Base Defend Pack
description: This is the Base Defend Pack for Dwarfs. We know everyone likes a good tower defense style game. Well, this is the Dwarfish take on it. Here, you create the maze for the enemies to follow, from up to four enemy spawn points. Well, actually, one of your Dwarfs will create the maze - so you'll want to direct him very carefully each time!

name: Dwarfs F2P: Difficulty Pack
description: This is the Difficulty Pack for Dwarfs. If you are real Dwarfs-lover, then the Easy and Normal difficulty levels in the Arcade mode just won't be enough for you. You will need more difficulty! So, this add-on is for you - it adds in the following extra difficulty levels (the 5, 15, 30 and 60 minute versions) for you to play in Arcade...

name: Killing Floor: PostMortem Character Pack
description: The PostMortem Character Pack adds 4 more new and unique playable characters for Killing Floor as Downloadable Content. Once you have bought the pack, they will become selectable in the character selection screen in-game.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Riho Futaba, Merry Santa Costume
description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF. And what's more, she's appearing in Santa Costume. She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.

name: Turbulence: Airplane Survival Simulator
description: In this simulator, when your airplane enters a massive storm, you aren't a passenger anymore. You are a survivor. Trapped at 35,000 feet, you need to keep a cool head and act fast to live through the crisis. Can you make it to a happy landing?

name: Divine Ascent: Map Pack
description: Divine Ascent: Map Pack contains 18 new maps for the Arena mode of Divine Ascent.

name: A Ninja in Training
description: A Ninja in Training includes 30 stages of 3d fast paced action platforms with earn-able medals.

name: Trainz Simulator 12: Aerotrain
description: By the 1950's, passenger revenues on America's railroads had long since passed their heyday. Automobiles were fast becoming an affordable option for the modern traveller, and flight was also steadily gaining in popularity.

name: Train Simulator 2021: LNER Black Class A3 'Flying Scotsman' Loco
description: One of the world's most famous locomotives, the Flying Scotsman, is now here for Train Simulator in a new LNER black livery.The Gresley-designed Flying Scotsman has become an icon of British steam, hauling the first non-stop Flying Scotsman train service from London to Edinburgh in 1928 and breaking records ever since.

name: Nightron Wars
description: The only goal in the Nightron Wars is to win. Nightron needs to be saving and only the best can do it. You can play single or team fights.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Ottoman Empire
description: In the Ottoman Empire campaign you will take part in the famous battle of Gallipoli on the Turkish army side under the command of Mustafa Kemal.

name: Throne of the Dead VR: Halloween
description: Don your scariest costume and prepare for the onslaught that is Throne of the Dead's Halloween DLC! Face off pumpkin headed hordes and un-dead campers across two all new maps, Graveyard and Camp Site!

name: Invisible Apartment 3
description: Third and final part of the cyberpunk visual novel series Invisible Apartment.

name: Railroad X: Berlin S-Bahn BR 481
description: The DB class 481/482 is an elektric railcar designed for conductor rail operation used by the S-Bahn Berlin. It's the latest design for the S-Bahn Berlin and currently the version that is used most.

name: Aerofly FS 2 Flight Simulator: Orbx - Chicago Meigs Field
description: Return to where it all began! Flight simulation has been intertwined with the legendary Meigs Field for decades.

name: Cruel TD
description: Four towers in the middle, thousands of monsters rushing them. Enjoy the pleasure of slaughtering in Cruel TD! Mind you, one careless move may lose the game!

name: Heroes & Generals: GE Soldier Pack - Heavy Tanker
description: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Heavy Tank arsenal, these 3 colossus warmachines are composed of hardened steel and explosive gunpowder. They will take on any armored vehicle used in World War 2 and suppress all enemy infantry in its area.

name: Wildfire: Ticket to Rock
description: A visual/kinetic novel about a girl who just wanted some free tickets to the local festival but soon found herself in a rock band and on a journey to discover who she's truly meant to be.

name: Protect Eggs
description: This is a 3D cartoon leisure game, the third person perspective operation mode, the player control the Phoenix to find the nest, start laying eggs, protect eggs and hatched birds, drive away foxes and eagles. The game includes simple RPG, ACT, construction, tower defense and other factors.

name: Sprite Man Adventures
description: ​In this game you will run around chopping enemies, dashing into them, and shooting arrows. Pick up chests around the map to earn health, exp., and even coins! Will you be able to defeat the boss?!

name: Santa's Bad Elf
description: Santa's Bad Elf is a great game to play while you wait for December 25th to come along. This simple touch game builds into an adrenalin pumping experience as your reactions are tested to the limit. Can you catch the Bad Elf or will you be fooled by the good Elf who dresses so similar? The game speeds up as time passes so you’ll have less time to react. One wrong tap and your score will be depleted by a third!

name: Super Hiking Simulator 2020: Escort Rin
description: Super Hiking Simulator 2020: Escort Rin is a free, short TPS add-on DLC to the Super Hiking Simulator 2020 video game.

name: Devil, It's Me
description: Devil, It’s Me is a game where you can build your own castle to defend against the waves of heroes set forth to defeat Magrandes. You play from the perspective of Magrandes to manage your castle. Fend off the endless hordes of heroes, overcome the odds and uncover the truth!

name: Open Bar
description: Have you ever dreamed of being a bartender? Ever wonder what magical ingredients actually make up those mystic cocktails? Now's your chance! With this first person, 3D, cooking style game, you are the bartender! Serve customers, take drink orders, earn tips and most fun of all, make the drinks!

name: Ahead
description: Playing as a light cube, you're falling short on energy and you need to collect energy prisms to get your power back to escape the darkness. The more prisms you get, the stronger your light will become, but can you survive until you pick enough ?

name: Father
description: Your daughter was offered a full-ride to a mysterious Ivy League school in Germany, but she never came home for Christmas. Explore a haunting campus in this classic FPS shooter inspired by Half-Life and Resident Evil.

name: Village Fest: Digging
description: Up to 4 player gold digging competition. Dig gold as much as you can and protect it from others... or be the one who is gonna steal, its up to you.

name: Void Hearts
description: In this game you'll play as a young boy who has been cursed with the power of emotions. Change your abilities based on your choices and harness the power of all your emotions, whether it be for the better of others or the better of yourself. The choice is yours!

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Sunset MP001
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies r to win the game. The DLC include map pack 001.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Sunset MP002
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies r to win the game. The DLC include map pack 002.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Sunset MP007
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies r to win the game. The DLC include map pack 007.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Sunset MP010
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies r to win the game. The DLC include map pack 010.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Sunset MP003
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies r to win the game. The DLC include map pack 003.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Sunset MP005
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies r to win the game. The DLC include map pack 005.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Sunset MP008
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies r to win the game. The DLC include map pack 008.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Sunset MP006
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies r to win the game. The DLC include map pack 006.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Sunset MP009
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them. Player control a fighter shoot down all the enemies r to win the game. The DLC include map pack 009.

name: Zombardment
description: How far can you go in stopping these vicious creatures from spawning. Play loads of levels and endless waves in this Top Down Action Packed Shooter game. Explore, Survive, Earn and Spend.

name: The World We Saved
description: The World We Saved is an environment simulation role-playing game. Your mission is simple: Survive and help others survive. Will you help us grow food, avoid the bad weather, and convince others to join our mission?

name: The test of beauty
description: This is just a 3D Spot the Difference game! There is nothing special in this game, except pretty girls, accurate models, high-definition screen and sometimes less dress up etc...

name: Great Song's Records of Economy
description: Great Song's Records of Economy is a simulation game based on Northern Song Dynasty. Player will act as a itinerant, and bargain with merchants around the country. Besides, player can listen to residents and look for business oppotunities. Lastly, establish own business empire and compose legendary.

name: Railroad Engineer
description: You build railroads, drive trains, collect resources, deliver goods, and watch cities grow.

name: La Dimensione Interna
description: La Dimensione Interna (The Dimension Within) is a third person 3D narrative adventure game in which you'll play as Giorgio, a journalist living in a small town in Tuscany, Italy, during his worse moment in life.

name: Kingso
description: Kingso is not just a medieval 2D strategy, but a very complex game in terms of realistic mechanics where absolutely no one knows what will happen next. Each campaign can be so unpredictable that it becomes unique compared to others.

name: Vitatio 3
description: VITATIO 3 brings a new take on the precision game genre, traverse your physics based ship through the asteroid belt in this infinite running score based avoidance game, upgrade your ship, unlock new paint jobs and customize your cockpit

name: Rocket Explorer
description: Rocket Explorer is a rocket viewing experience, where you can view the rockets of the world with your own eyes. Also in Virtual Reality! Launch rockets, compare them side by side, and take them apart.

name: Mesozoikum
description: Mesozoikum is an open-world dinosaur survival game and guides you through the atmospheric world of the Jura.

name: Space Alpha
description: Fight in single - or multiplayer mode with other players and or AI, in this fast paced sci-fi shooter.

name: Signs of Zodiac
description: Simple rest puzzle line game You just need to move your finger to unlock the beautiful constellation No special background story, just simple jigsaw and appreciation Relax yourself

name: Tales of Kongfu
description: Sin descripción

name: Crimson Glaive Sigma
description: Enjoy this 2D metroidvania-like bullet hell platformer. Jump, dodge and traverse using your jet pack. Find weapons and abilities. Fight bosses and escape an old space station drifting through the cosmos. You are alone, with nothing but a space suit and a gun. Just keep going! Persevere and triumph!

name: Rou Niu Yang Zhi Ji Hua
description: Sin descripción

name: Misuto
description: Hip Hop Samurai Action with stylish combat and relaxing environments. A wandering samurai gets lost in a mist, but it's not as simple as it looks at first glance. Can you find the way out?

name: Page One
description: A beach, a house, the howling rain and a mystery to uncover. Playable in both desktop and VR take control of the first chapter of this 360 degree hand drawn adventure.

name: Beyond Polaris Guardian
description: Beyond Polaris Guardian is a action-rpg and TPS on a flexible campaign system with different stories. Incarne 3 unique characters and develop your personal story thanks to the innovative Galactic Network system.

name: The Un-Beatable Game
description: A game you probably won't beat, but why don't you try?

name: Synonym
description: Synonym is an atmospheric puzzle game with mechanics inspired by mimicry. Manipulate blocks that will copy your position, height and rotation.

name: Energy Island Corp.
description: Build and manage an electric grid ! At the start of the day, build new infrastructure and plan your day. Once ready, start the day then watch electricity production / consumption in real time to adjust your buildings settings. The growth of the islands depends on you !

name: Whacky Golf
description: Battle your friends in a chaotic game of mini-golf with up to 4 players. Whack and steal to get the lowest score you can. Just watch your back!

name: Queen of the Pack
description: After being bitten, Farrah is thrust into a world of half-wolves and other creatures she never knew existed. Now she must learn to either embrace her new life as a member of the pack, or remain a human.

name: Whone
description: Collect the Hidden Gems, Survive the Treacherous Levels, and Upgrade Your Abilities as You Jump Your Way to Victory! But WATCH-OUT, if You Touch the Ground, You DIE!

name: Celestial Reactors
description: A virtual reality experience where you explore mysterious landscapes and meet the entities inhabiting it.

name: Blured Angel
description: Blured Angel is a kind of somatosensory game that uses a camera on a Windows host to capture and interact with each other. It weaves a heaven I see from the spiritual world of the Bible from the perspective of a not so smart but persistent angel "Mehoo".

name: Professional Team
description: The popular global coffin carrying culture is coming. Many different coffin carrying heroes, DIY coffin system. Come and hold an unforgettable funeral for him in your heart!

name: Disgrace
description: Disgrace is an action adventure game that can certainly require a lot of thinking from the player. Done intentionally so as not to be too intuitive, the player will have to rely on their observation and deductions in order to progress in the game.

name: Ace Campus Club
description: Receiving a call from your lawyer, and was informed that if you are capable of leading the campus‘s club to become the most popular ones, you will inherit a large sum of money. With the rare chance to finally stepping out, there will be money, and even girls.

name: Pixel Fixer
description: Restore 100 pictures, which were accidentally shredded. Click and drag the rows, and the will be glued when you release them so that they fit together. You can zoom the pixels to see how they fit, and you can choose 7 difficulty levels to find the best amusing challenge.

name: Zombase
description: Survive through progressively harder waves and build defences to protect your respawn orb! Post Apocalyptic Zombie Survival Builder. Build defenses! Blast zombies! Have fun! Perfect for any gamer! As always, HAVE FUN!

name: Unstoppable Man
description: Fire started!

name: Cyber Fight Challenge
description: CFC is a sporting simulator developed for PC, the basic concept is participation in contests under the professional boxing rules

name: Supreme AI: Arena
description: A minimalistic, fast-paced top-down arena shooter against a state-of-the-art artificial intelligence. Fight AI agents whose speed, tactics, gunplay control and obsession to win have been trained for years of virtual playtime and now delivered to you in 60-seconds-long battles.

name: Other Realms
description: Dwarven based survival multiplayer game, craft, build your kingdom piece by piece. Set foundations, forge devices and conquer your dwarven realm.

name: Hero Mini Maker
description: Build fantasy miniatures using over 800 stylized parts. Export them as STL files for 3D printing, or use one of our online 3D printing partners to bring your creations to life.

name: Isle Vatra
description: Isle Vatra is a mysterious island surrounded by dangerous sealife. When a research station goes silent, you're send to the island to investigate.

name: Spectrum
description: Spectrum is a short puzzle platformer about color in a dull world. Explore over 100+ levels of tight, puzzle-platforming to become the king of all colors. Switch colors to interact with a multitude of mechanics that allow for deep, complex interaction.

name: The Epsilon Outcome
description: A dry-humored, sci-fi interactive story where you interact with characters, work with objects, and complete puzzles to solve the mystery of why a major science experiment went wrong.

name: Raivo
description: Collect a team of robots called Raivos. These highly advanced creatures are quick at learning. They start with no knowledge, so everything they learn, through advanced machine learning, they learn from you. Enter your Raivos in an online arena fight against Raivos trained by other players.

name: Infinite Way
description: Infinite Way is a deck-building roguelike where you travel, fight and survive in post apocalyptic world.

name: Zeliria Sanctuary II: Xinori Asylum
description: The adventures of Maxx, Humkey and their friends continue! Is Zeliria really a kind of sanctuary? Who invaded the empty planet, failing to wake the absolute weapon sleeping in its bowels? The continuation of the fascinating history Zeliria Sanctuary is already waiting for you!

name: Virtual telescope
description: Get the star sky that is above you and visit other planets in the virtual reality!

name: Invisible Man
description: A story about a man turned invisible by an experiment. Explore the mysterious facility and escape it.

name: Verz
description: The game is a Virtual reality experience where the player will experience escape room styled levels. Each tier of levels will have a different theme and puzzles to be solved.

name: Elemental Defenders TD
description: A Tower Defense where the Towers are moving around the enemies. With over 200 towers and endless mode. There is almost infinite strategies.

name: Southern cross Battle force
description: This is a horizontal retro arcade-style STG shooting game. Players need to control fighters to defeat the ultimate villain FightFox and rescue EAU and the Southern Cross Union headquarters.

name: Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room
description: Deathtrap Dungeon: The Golden Room is an interactive movie based on Ian Livingstone's multi-million selling classic gamebook. Starring Georgia Hirst (Five Dates, Vikings) and Marcus Fraser (Transformers: The Last Knight)

name: Solar Baron
description: As head of an interplanetary corporation, your goal is to extract resources from across the solar system and bring them home faster and cheaper than your competitors. Construct trade depots and colonies. Build rockets and spaceports. Master realistic orbital mechanics and maximize profits.

name: Space Train
description: What if there was a train, in space? Embark as a simple passenger or take a longer-term role as a member of staff in an asymmetric gaming experience like no other.

name: Project BioRisk
description: Survive the nightmare in this multiplayer cooperative survival horror experience.

name: Netaboku: A robot girl changes my life as a bedridden boy
description: This game is a sci-fi romantic adventure(visual novel) modeled after the avatar robot cafe. Japan, circa 2040. Kanto lives in a residential facility for the severely physically disabled. One day, they meet a mysterious girl, Kanata, and their destiny changes dramatically...

name: The Universe
description: Feel like you are in space ! This application has been created in a photorealistic way, you will feel like you are on Mars, Jupiter, Mercury ... and ISS ! The best education game. If you like astronomy this is your application. You will feel that you are in space observing the entire universe.

name: Robot Fight
description: Robot Fight is what it looks like. A simple, funny "board game". Fast play with 1-2 minutes per round. The realy play with friends game. The feeling of life, when we laugh together about ourselves and our friends. Of course, it is spiced with the words "how can you be have a such of luck".

name: Lucid: A Game About Dreams
description: In a small fishing village in Sápmi - the land of the midnight sun - Leif’s life as a cowardly, lonely & boring accountant is coming to an end. He has nothing to lose except the dreams he is suddenly remembering. This is where you come in...

name: Punk A.F.
description: Punk A.F. is a gorgeous and brutal hand-drawn old-school vertical-scrolling 2D shooter game set in the alternate timeline of 197X. Join the Punk Air Force, a rebel team of extreme special-ops pilots violently uprising against corrupt politicians and their greedy corporate overlords.

name: Rockin' Road
description: Rockin' Road is our love letter to Road Rash, FlatOut and other cool arcade racing games.

name: Forsaken Spire
description: Forsaken Spire is an untethered physics-based climbing game. You see it, you climb it: however you can!

name: Fire Protection Training Simulator
description: This Fire Protection Training Simulator was designed and developed to provide employers, of any size, with the most cost-effective method of verifying their employees understanding of fires, how they're started, how to prevent them and how to properly respond in the event of one.

The year is 9001. Humanity has spread across the stars. While the masses suffer in absolute poverty, the wealthy elite use their incredible resources to genetically engineer themselves into something more than mere mortals. The galaxy is now ruled by these tyrants. Can you defeat them?

name: VectorBall
description: VectorBall is a multiplayer dodgeball inspired game. Throw balls and move out of the way of incoming balls, this is a fast paced game with easy to understand mechanics. Throw a damage ball to kill another player. If you want to move, throw a teleport ball, or dodge by moving in your play area.

name: Olden: Card Game
description: Olden: Card Game is an online multiplayer (1v1) turn based game in which players need to harvest 300 value points from their own cards while not allowing opponent to do the same. Both players share the same deck and have only one move per turn

name: Fred the Rubber Ducky
description: Help Fred navigate through the world in his search for destiny, where danger lies around the corner in each of the 8 unique handcrafted and challenging levels.

name: Gan's Matchstick Men: Deadly Rhythm
description: Matchstick Men: Deadly rhythm is a local multiplayer fighting game. Use strange mechanics to blow your opponents.(Temporary multiplayer is not supported)

name: Half-Fly3
description: Play as the Fly in a physics based,colorful,rogue-lite world where Cakes and Cherries fall from the sky. Don't let them turn your head. Falling into the dark abyss they back to you as... simple Bomb,Curse or something more powerful.

name: Withdrawn
description: A game about loneliness in adulthood. Withdrawn is a hand-drawn point-and-click interactive fiction where you're following the main character's routine, thoughts, memories and his constant fear of living.

name: Prometheus OS
description: A text-based detective puzzle game

name: Do 11
description: Find a way out of the Do 11 app by doing missions that come from the mysterious Do 11 app. A choice awaits you to solve puzzles and change the fate of the protagonist. Escape the main character from the Do 11 app while savoring a profound worldview and intriguing story. An incredible twist awaits.

name: Automation
description: PLC Ladder Logic programming simulator.

name: Captain Edgar Giza
description: Captain Edgar Giza is a lightning-fast fusion of the FPS and action genres. Use your agility and combat skills to survive, and solve the mystery of Giza. As the only soldier sent from our world after a discovery at Giza, you find yourself fighting to get rid of deadly creatures. Become Captain Edgar with detailed graphics, intense first-person action and incredible mechanics.

name: Warrior Bloodline: Path of Survival
description: An epic journey of the fellowship of the children bonded by blood, escaped an experimental camp, wandering the woods and struggling both to survive and to reveal their destiny. An immersive, story-driven exploration game with a strong focus on realistic survival.

name: ScreenSpace
description: Test your focus and reflexes in this simplistic clicking challenge!

name: Delta Light
description: Delta Light is a retro Arcade strategy/puzzle game where you draw lines to remove parts of the field while enemies try to stop you. Combine your speed and insight to out maneuver and puzzle your way around the enemies to complete the many levels! Pick it up and have a go!

name: Blasten!!
description: Blasten!! is a retro side-scrolling shooter with 6 stages of robot-busting action! Can you master all the robot power-ups and keep world peace?

name: Warhaos
description: Karekterini oluşturup yaratıkları kes, görevleri tamamla, deneyim kazan ve bir efsaneye dönüş!

name: Path to Etinway
description: Path to Etinway is a fantasy RPG adventure game where you play as a lone warrior navigating through a strange land filled with mystery and danger. On your journey, discover new environments and fight different enemies to gain new abilities and hone your skills.

name: Keridwen
description: A fun and accessible Sokoban-like puzzle game about an apprentice Witch exploring various worlds with unique mechanics to discover new spells to add to her spellbook. Push blocks, solve puzzles, and cast spells to become a master Witch.

name: The other side: My own horror
description: A small horror about a young man Stefan, whose life turns into a nightmare. Help him cope with the situation and understand what happened.

name: The first titans
description: The first titans is an indie VR game where the shooters, tower defense and strategy games meet together. You will land in a hostile planet where you have to protect your crystal reactor. Recollect resources, build towers and kill the aliens trying to destroy you.

name: Bamboo Forest
description: Send your Panda on an adventure and at the same time you'll learn how to code cool algorithms! Guide your Panda through colorful areas by using simple commands. Learn programming / STEM concepts like recursion and loops while having fun. But beware! Don't get caught while eating bamboo!

name: Reconnect
description: 在21世纪30年代的世界，任何新鲜事物都不足为奇，城市里每天都喧闹非凡。“我”和妹妹则是离开了那热闹的中心，搬到了这偏僻的乡下地带，和在这里认识的朋友们每天生活在愉快的日常里。不过这平静的日常又能持续多久呢？

name: Burst Planet
description: This is a distant alien world. As a member of Gamma planet, you need to investigate the truth of the explosion of the main star and fight against the monsters in the space to maintain the operation of star station 0.

name: Zone B Korosu
description: Zone B Korosu is a story-driven 2D platforming game. Run, jump, shoot, and roll your way from ground zero of Test Zone B to safety. Click and search your environment for any clues to unlocking the mystery.

name: Sand Castles
description: SAND CASTLES is a Kingdom and Castle Building Real-Time Strategy / 4X game with a full 3D Graphics Engine. The game supports up to 6-players and features true fog of war within the 3D game world. Your available resources are Gold, Sand, Lumber, and Food.

name: Growbots: Battle Academy
description: After crash-landing on an alien planet, you find your sibling missing. Now, you’ll have to venture out into this dangerous planet in search of your kin. Battle and scan wild monsters to acquire new moves for battle, unlock different types, and build Growbots of your very own to fight alongside you.

name: S.E.A.
description: Dive into the chillest watercraft simulator. Play, relax, or explore. It's your sea now.

name: Deadbait
description: Deadbait is a VR Horror multiplayer (3vs1) game where one Player becomes a terrifying Murderer/MISV Subject, and 3 Players are Survivors/MISV Agents who need to play as a team to escape or overcome the gruesome Nightmare.

name: Cherry VX
description: Cherry VX is a futuristic adult entertainment suite featuring gorgeous models and unmatched interaction. Finally, the technology has come far enough for truly compelling intimate experiences with cybernetic humans. Time to live out your cyberpunk fantasies!

name: Wholesome: Out and About
description: You've come to help your Granny after a terrible storm destroyed her cottage and wreaked havoc in her idyllic coastal town. Can you find a way of restoring her home and uniting the townsfolk? Connect with nature by foraging, gardening, and cooking, then try out your new skills in the real world!

name: Catman: Gimmick Action Game
description: You controls CATMAN to advance the stage. Go on the stage while riding the lift. The BGM of each stage will also excite your play. Simple, cute and enjoyable for everyone.

name: Green Steel
description: Battle with tanks in local multiplayer combat. Destroy your oppenets to win.

name: Massacre Tower
description: With four towers as the center, enjoy the pleasure of mowing the grass" Unlimited free trade!"(real person market)"Really bet" on the feeling of a heartbeat"Arbitrary stack" skillNo fixed taskAttribute points with no restrictions

name: Dream of Tomorrow
description: Accompany Lena, our heroine, and her little likeable sidekick on their adventure and find out why she is being bullied, where bullying comes from and what she can do about it.

name: Moon Farming
description: Tired from the same farming games on Earth? Now, take on the new role of a super modern farmer on the Moon! Explore new farming possibilities in a new Moon environment. Prepare land on Moon for your base and vertical farming inside of it. For sure, it will be farming like never Before!

name: Dungeon Coup
description: Run through the sexyest dungeon, filled with rebel minions trying to stop you before you reach your throne room! What 's the catch? your hands are tied, your minions are horny and will try everything to make you fail your challenge!

name: Star Dust: A Journey Through Space
description: Go on an exciting journey through space in this lovingly designed indie rogue-lite space shooter. Gather ressources, craft new equipment and level up your pilot to set against the hordes of alien enemies. Party up with companions that will make your journey less lonely and help you on your path.

name: Jetpackin' Heat++
description: Robots from CompanyCorp Industries Inc. all over the galaxy have begun to go rogue, and they've invaded your city. You're the only schmuck who can afford a jetpack, are you up to the task to save your disgusting pile of a city?

name: Touge Challenge
description: Touge Challenge is a street racing arcade game heavily inspired by the racers of the mid 2000s.

name: Alaska Gold Fever
description: It’s 1896 and recently something unbelievable has been discovered in the cold and wild fields of Alaska. It was something special and precious, something so valuable that entire kingdoms fell over for its beauty… GOLD!

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Amazon River
description: Have you ever dreamed of hunting river monsters? There are plenty of them in the Amazon! This beautiful, mysterious and dangerous river is inhabited by many species of predatory fish, which are considered one of the most dangerous in the world!

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Greenland
description: Take a boat along the cold waters of the seas and face one of the oldest sharks floating in the waters of Greenland! Take advantage of the new trolling function and feel like a real sea wolf!

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Kariba Dam
description: Experience amazing moments here by catching colorful fish species and moments of horror by looking into the mouth full of tigerfish teeth. Beware, the local waters are full of monsters!

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Moraine Lake
description: Famous glacial lake in Canada. The lake contains numerous species of Trout and Zander. Of course, those are not the only species found here. Maybe you should find out for yourself about the secrets that are hiding in this lake?

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Thailand
description: Welcome to Thailand - a paradise for fishermen. You will catch a lot of big and dangerous fish here. Choose the right gear, hop on the boat and sweep the local waters! Monsters exist and if they are somewhere - it's right here!

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator VR: Japan
description: In the land of cherry blossoms, 9 new species of fish are waiting for you. You will be able to catch both colourful Koi Carp and huge monsters that would easily drag you under the water. Welcome to Japan!

name: Delivery Simulator
description: This is a game that simulates delivery. The player is a rider, and the job is to deliver the delivery from the merchant to the customer.

name: Tiny Vision
description: The core of the game is to solve the mystery with the element of suspense. The story takes place in China in 2003. The player will play a sick little boy in the game. He will recall the good things and save himself from escaping again and again.

name: Pretty girls teach beefy guys
description: For beefy guys, girls always have a lot of curiosity. Where exactly does their strength come from? Can beefy guys be coached? I think I should try.
